name: Berry Hunt Survivors
description: Berry Hunt Survivors is a Reverse-Bullet-Hell Game with Rouge-lite elements. Choose your character, defeat enemies, learn new abilities and destroy the big bosses!

name: Portabellows
description: Become the emissary of a marooned pie shopkeeper and repay their debt to the island's deity one pie at a time, clearing their challenges to kick them out of your retirement sanctuary! Uncover new abilities in a whimsical world full of exploration.

name: Hyper Hentai Devil Hell
description: Hyper Hentai Devil Hell is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of hell of devil and multiple unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Melody Mania
description: Let your talent shine when you sing along your favorite songs in this fun party game! A variety of modes let you play with friends or compete against them. An open song format and integrated editor provide boundless possibilites.

name: Accurate Adjacent Ballistics Simulator
description: A.A.B.S. Accurate Adjacent Ballistics Simulator The Most Advanced Ballistic Damage Detection/Application System In Virtual Reality.

name: One-armed Cook: Ships and Oceans
description: Are you prepared to set sail on a culinary adventure? Get ready to cook on the open sea, with mouth-watering new meals for the guests.

name: Beach Invasion 1945: Pacific
description: Beach Invasion 1945: Pacific is a WWII FPS game where you defend the fortified Pacific island beaches against invading forces who will attack you with troops, tanks, planes and more! Use the iconic Japanese and American WWII weaponry, and prepare your defenses with mines, explosives and bonuses!

name: Victoria 3: Voice of the People
description: Relive the dramatic political events of the 19th century! Drawing from the historical struggles between reformists, reactionaries and revolutionaries, Voice of the People puts you in the middle of political crises as charismatic characters from history vigorously push their agendas.

name: ShudderStep
description: "ShudderStep" is a terrifying first-person horror game that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Step into the shoes of a survivor who must navigate a dark and foreboding world filled with unspeakable horrors. Can you survive the darkness and uncover the secrets that lie hidden within?

name: Autarkis
description: A hard to master survival strategy game. Build an balance up to three colonies at once, mine ressources, manage energy and survive until you build up a 6 stage rocket to flee with your 100 settlers.This game is hard to master, prepare to fail!

name: Abathor: Atlantis Landing
description: Play Abathor Atlantis Landing and relive the glory of arcades in this action platformer for up to 4 players.

name: Owinka Shooter 2
description: Owinka Shooter 2 throws you right back into the story of Owinka 427. Prepare to escape the Institute once and for all!

name: The Quiet Things
description: An auto-biographical, narrative game, based on real diary entries kept as a teenager. The Quiet Things seeks to explore mental health issues with a raw but brave look at childhood abuse and trauma. With a deep focus on storytelling through audio, set foot in Alice’s world and hear her story.

name: The Rusty Longsword
description: Join Rana, a cute gnome, on a whimsical adventure up a magical island in this enchanting 3D pixel art game. Meet new friends, collect treasures, and unlock secrets along the way!

name: Taoism
description: Taoism is a Roguelike card game with unique playing methods. Use the cards embodied in faith to explore the foggy Luonan country, and use the unique rules "Hunyuan" and "Qixiang" to uncover the truth behind the undercurrent with the protagonists in a huge conspiracy about people, Taoism and ghosts.

name: Venice After Dark
description: A visual novel adventure alongside young Japanese engineer Aiko and her AI friend. Solve the mysterious case around the Stucky family and unravel what it means to be human through the eyes of an AI programmer.

name: Frenemies
description: A cut-throat multiplayer game that strands players on a mysterious island where trust is a luxury and betrayal is a necessity. Inspired by Among Us and the tv show Survivor, you will need to build alliances and fight for immunity to become the last player standing.

name: Buntasy
description: Let your imagination loose in this Lego-like physics-based sandbox game of your dreams! Create any kind of game you want using the map editor or pick from a vast array of sample mini-games that you can play offline or online with your friends!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Toys
description: Puzzles of toys!

name: My Horse: Bonded Spirits
description: Build a bond with your horse and gain its trust. Develop yours and the horse’s skills. Discover the surrounding open world. Complete tasks and take part in competitions. Rebuild a run-down stud farm!

name: Crescent Lands: The Farm
description: Crescent Lands: The Farm is a 3D Farming Sim in which the players strive to create a reputable farm. Customize your character, Produce whatever your heart wants, Nurture your farm animals and Take on jobs to deliver produce within the job's time limit or be slapped with a penalty for being tardy.

name: SimpliCity
description: A sandbox game about building a city without all those hassle from complicated systems.

name: Trans Neuronica
description: Link nodes; Untangle paths; Rebuild memory; Assess humans; A puzzle where logic goes hand in hand with surgical precision and humans ask artificial intelligence for help. But only if you trust them enough.

name: When God Left Us
description: When God Left Us is a first-person horror game set in a corrupted world, a world that God abandoned before creating ours. Pronouncing the name of that forsaken place will open a portal to its grounds. Despite the warnings, you dare to try this yourself.

name: Javier
description: Help Javier on his journey to "El Dorado", a city made of gold, in this super platform game with hundreds of challenging and addictive platform screens. See the reasons for his ambition and question his decisions with him.

name: Drake's Dungeon
description: An adult, survival game where hunky men battle hordes of lusty monsters! The more monsters you kill, the more sticky, sweaty, muscle-packed story you'll unlock. Better start whackin'.

name: Legend of Kungfu
description: The game is an action-adventure role-playing game that incorporates elements of Chinese mythology.

name: ArchiHexago
description: ArchiHexago is a casual puzzle game which takes inspiration from match-3 genre and takes it one step further. Each tile type has unique pattern which you need to match in order to gain points. And each level has different tile sets and obstacles to give you a variety of challenges.

name: Ember Throne Online
description: Ember Throne Online is a MMORPG that takes place in a universe based on Ancient China but also includes elements of fantasy and local mythology. The game's blends Western fantasy style with Far Eastern cultural characteristics, including legends, architecture, and combat philosophy.

name: Level Up: The Gamer Girls
description: The gamer girls have picked up some goodies, made themselves comfortable and are ready for a good game!

name: ShadowKitty: Thief by Night
description: ShadowKitty: Thief by Night is a fun 2D Cartoon Platformer currently in development. This is the story of an unusual thief who steals artworks from criminals and returns it to the museum. The game is inspired by classic games like Megaman X, Spelunky, Ducktales Remastered and CupHead.

name: Interlinked
description: Build infrastructure to connect the expanding world to the internet! Having a working strategy and great management is key to winning your competition in this capitalist environment.

name: Shroom Siege
description:
Welcome to Shroom Siege, a fast-paced multiplayer game that balances strategy and fun. In a 4 vs 4 setting, you'll embody a shroom character, coordinating with your teammates and using quick thinking to outsmart your opponents.

Shroom Siege brings together the best aspects of local and online multiplayer games, making it a versatile choice for any gaming session. Whether you're sharing a couch with friends or playing with others from around the globe, this game ensures a dynamic experience tailored to your setup.
What's more, Shroom Siege supports cross-play across Steam and Nintendo Switch platforms, bringing together an even larger community of players. This means you can compete with friends and others regardless of their chosen platform. And don't worry if you're short of human players - AI steps in to balance the 4v4 gameplay.

name: Premonition
description: Scavenge resources and find supplements to satisfy your addiction.

name: Explottens: Rise of K.L.A.W
description: Defeat your enemies in this heart pumping, pawtastic shoot 'em up as you zip, boost & shoot through the sky fighting your ferocious felines. Unlock different missions and sidekicks to provide cover and some comic relief and emerge undefeatable in this catacular adventure. May the Force be with you!

name: Champion's Chalice
description: Champion’s Chalice is a single player Roguelike Auto Battler. Choose your champion, buy units and items, roll the shop, and battle enemy parties. Discover unique and powerful synergies as you traverse varied environments in search of prized treasure. Can you find the chalice?

name: Behind the Barrier
description: The year is 1440, and you are a priest that was brave enough to travel to the village of Rosenwood to cleanse the evil spirit (demon) that has been lurking there. . .

name: Wooden Battles: Spec Ops
description: Wooden Battles: Spec Ops is a stealth action strategy game. Take control of a group of 4 special forces units with unique abilities, infiltrate the enemy base and complete the mission objectives. Use the in-game level editor to create your own missions and upload them to the Steam Workshop.

name: Marbles in Space
description: Embark on an intergalactic adventure in 'Marbles in Space.' Collect marbles and defeat opponents in this action-packed rogue-lite game. Earn experience and credits to unlock new skills and upgrades. With stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, it's the perfect game for action and strategy fans.

name: Survival in Snow
description: You play as Hayan, a survivor who crashes into a snowy field due to the breakdown of the aircraft, she was on during his journey. To return home, Hayan needs to use his smartphone to gather various wild materials to create items or structures.

name: Slice and Bite
description: You are a pizza delivering vampire in demon infested medieval Italy. Choose your delivery routes and upgrade your magical carriage. Save your family pizzeria from certain doom by slicing your way through levels, defeating challenging boss fights, uncovering secrets and exploring the world.

name: Dreamkeeper
description: You play as Marshmallow, the cute little pet of a girl named Ava who wants to become a heroine and save her village from the Nightmares. To protect her you use magical bullets, tarot-cards and try to find your very own playstyle to unlock the story and get the highest score!

name: Disminal
description: Wandering into the uncanny concept of liminality, captured in DV tape format you explore what seems to be another dimension, lost in an endless space that looks human-made but isn't.

name: Fate of New Albans
description: Engage with the townsfolk and native people to make decisions and choices, your actions will decide the fate of New Albans. With multiple endings, solve puzzles, speak to NPCs and explore the land in this story adventure.

name: Songs of Life
description: Card drama adventure game. With the epidemic, no one can be left alone. You will play as Hua Tuo, Zhang Zhongjing and Dong Feng, with the help of surgery, potions, and even the power of the gods, to end this tragic chaos, uncover the truth of the world and destroy the culprits of it all.

name: Angus and the Gates of Chaos
description: An exciting and comedic retro adventure!

name: Kalevania
description: Kalevania is a retro action platformer loosely based on Finnish mythology. Fight with bare hands, sword, axe, bow, and 11 runic weapons. With 50+ enemy types and collectibles, enjoy a full retro gaming experience! Play as Väinämöinen and relive classic console gaming!

name: Dippy & Chippy
description: Join forces with your best friend and embark on a thrilling adventure as the two-headed ogre duo, Dippy & Chippy, in the ultimate two-player couch coop game of exploring dungeons and discovering treasures!

name: Dragon Uprising Online
description: An action game mainly focused on boss rushing in coop !

name: Freak Crossing
description: An accident makes you the temporary village head of a village of male thieves and female prostitutes...

name: Unbroken
description:
Brave the hostile lands in search of your goal. Forge your own path and discover the many secrets of the realm and the looming Township of Westfall. Unlock new abilities, perks and weapons. Soak in the atmosphere and head forth against all odds.

A mood heavy action-adventure, Unbroken takes players on a grindhouse journey to Crests Edge in search of the traitor Nielsen. With multiple routes to achieve your goal (or even abandon it), the ascent to one of the multiple endings will be a memorable one.

With a unique lore structure and one of a kind audio visual composition, Unbroken will take players on a trip.

name: Live with Mary
description: You play as Danny, who is assigned by his sister to run her home, and he has to live with a beautiful girl named Mary. You have 7 days to impress her to get the ending you want.

name: CorpoBots
description: CorpoBots is the ultimate battle party game! A twin-stick action hack n' slash designed for 4 players, where you build and customize your own bot, choose your weapons, abilities and movement style. If you can make it to the top, become the Boss Bot in an epically hectic battle against your friends!

name: Space Order Mine
description: Reverse minesweeper with inventory management roguelike. Collect items, organize inventory, mine for energy and vanquish your foes!

name: Venox: The Alien Survivors
description: You are a Venox who invades planets to explore and mine for mech parts to merge with. You must repair and protect your ship from enemy waves while doing so. Venox is half alien and half mecha, but stronger than both!

name: UCaptain2: World of Fishing
description: Boats. Crabs. Fishing. Ocean. Customizations. Free. It goes on and on. Stop reading, just download now!

name: Spellfort
description: A co-op action RPG, with online multiplayer functionality, wave-based combat, and character enhancement inspired by trading card games.

name: Saber Ball
description: Retro-futuristic VR game were you hit energy balls with glowing sabers. Inspired by Beat Saber and Pinball.

name: Super Power Racing
description:
Get ready to experience a thrilling top-down arcade racing game that's inspired by the classic 90s racing games you know and love.

Super Power Racing League is the prestigious racing competition where ruthless competitors from around the world come together to tear up the track and power their way to victory.

Get ready to feel the adrenaline rush of Super Power Racing League, where the competition is fierce and the stakes are high. Start your engines and let the race begin!

name: Ascension
description: In this cultivation 4X strategy game, your sect has been in peril, and so they open a portal—sending you, a young disciple and their last hope, inside. Stand tall as the new sect leader and guide disciples to rebuild what was lost. Sharpen your focus, master alchemy, and ascend to immortality.

name: Starri
description: Starri is a body-controlled rhythm game you can play with just a webcam, no VR required. Feel your heart pumping as you slash or catch the beat, dodge obstacles, and turn the wheel. Engage your body with music from Indie classics, Global Top Hits and Asian lineups.

name: Please
description: Please is a VR top-down rhythm RPG with various rhythm game mechanics and bullet hell boss battles. Explore the mystery of what this world is and why you are here, learn about the resident's traumas and how to listen to them, and survive to the end!

name: Gather
description: Harvest crop, pick fruit, collect bales, chop down trees, plant seeds all while investigating and exploring a series of tiny islands along the way. Discover the secrets hidden in the lands while relaxing and solving mysterious puzzle of the land.

name: Guild Keeper
description: Lead a Guild of Heroes in this party-based RPG with realistic battle mechanics and strategic elements. Explore challenging dungeons. Build your base. Trade, craft and enchant items. The fate of your Guild is in your hands.

name: Kingdom Incremental
description: Kingdom Incremental is a satirical city builder and incremental game. To be the wealthiest ruler, you must build a fortified settlement and balanced economy, strategically invest in upgrades, and expand your kingdom across the globe! Then burn everything down to start again with even more power!

name: Dreamy Trail
description: Welcome to Dreamy Trail, a captivating walking simulator that takes you on a peaceful journey through a mystical forest. Immerse yourself in the serene atmosphere as you explore the forest, collect items, and uncover hidden secrets.

name: Foresia: The Cursed Oath
description: Foresia is a rare High Elf living in the Spirit Tree Forest. Suddenly, monsters set fire to her village and Foresia is captured and enslaved. With the help of the spirit, she manages to escape but is plagued by a curse she cannot resist.

name: NightMetal
description: Descend into the abyss of a world controlled by a mysterious and ominous super AI. Pilot your bio-mechanically connected mecha, Krypt, through the eerie and dystopian cityscapes as you confront the unknown lurking in the shadows.

name: VoxSys
description: Step into the future with VoxSys, the exhilarating arena shooter that combines cooperative PvP combat with innovative building mechanics. Strategize and use your cover to your advantage! Destroy your opponents and earn the title of Intergalactic Champion.

name: The Apothecary
description: Discover the source of a mysterious plague and build your apothecary in the city of Bloodmill. An epic adventure in a world full of disease and ruin. Explore the city, build your apothecary, create toxic potions, fight corrupt diseased creatures, discover powerful weapons and useful allies.

name: Lone King: Expansion
description: Expansion Content:2 new abilities per maniple2 new story chaptersUnlocks Team ModeMore content based on player demand

name: Legacy of Allard
description: Play a 2D, Turn-based Strategy, Artillery-based, Single and Multiplayer RPG. Build endless team compositions and unique characters, combining between 5 classes and dozens of special abilities. While taking advantage of the destructible terrain and interactive map mechanics.

name: Kill Baby Kill
description: Unleash your inner fighter and seek vengeance in this explosive top-down co-op action game! Take on the roles of a husband and wife duo as they battle their way through a tower to reclaim their children.

name: Let's Make a Potion
description: Welcome Potion Crafter! Lets Make A Potion is a casual puzzle like experience where you have to collect the correct potion ingredients and avoid collecting the wrong ingredients.

name: Airscrew Racing
description: Take flight on a chaotic and ruthless fusion of Third-person shooter and high-speed aerial racing. Harness your marksmanship and lightning-fast reflexes to outmaneuver opponents and seize victory. Will you conquer the skies and rise as the ultimate ace?

name: Maid's Melancholy
description: Apprentice Maid Clara's Maid Job! This game feature a journey of maid girl's work performing various tasks.

name: Magic City Detective: Rage Under Moon DLC
description: Explore additional locations and achieve new goals! Could you become a werewolves' true friend? Let’s find out what you’re capable of!

name: Seven Nights Ghost
description: "Peaceful days full of curses" Heartwarming FPS horror exploration game about 7 days of strange communal living with ghosts

name: Blood Pivot
description: Get ready for a heart-stopping experience with Blood Pivot, an electrifying pixel top-down indie game. Fight against demons and cultists in this horror game while trying to know the background of it all. Enter the world of Blood Pivot if you dare. But do you even have a choice?

name: Origin Unknown
description: Investigate the recently condemned High Rock Hotel in this mystery horror expedition. Solve the disappearance of your father as Lin Wei as she evades parasitic monsters and discovers clues to the truth of what truly transpired in this 1970's hotel.

name: The Crimson Kingdom
description: Travel and fight your way through this fantasy world to save your kingdom from evil forces in a 2d roguelike adventure!

name: Don't Die, Collect Loot
description: Don't Die, Collect Loot is an arcade roguelite where you guide your hero through a series of infinite retro worlds, attempting to stay alive, collect loot, and grow in power. Grow in power and live the ultimate Action RPG fantasy!

name: Delphiniums Rise
description: Delphiniums Rise- A Fantasy Based, Full Loot MMORPG set in a world of wonder, magic and adventure. Experience this bold graphicly impacting MMORPG alone or with others, but be on your toes, as you can and will drop everything in your bags, and destroy your armor upon falling in Delphiniums Rise.

name: Scraponauts
description: You are a Scraponaut, create your own spaceplane with unique parts each affecting the way your plane behaves. Collect scrap while exploring procedurally generated islands, unlock and discover unique new parts to upgrade your spaceplane.

name: On the Wind's Breath
description: In On the Wind's Breath, play as a dandelion seed, navigate obstacles, find fertile soil, take control of the wind, grow into a flower. Simple graphics, intuitive controls, meditative experience. Beware of unsuitable surfaces. Soothing soundtrack, a journey through various regions.

name: Puzzled Runner
description: Endless flight in space. Letters fly past you. Your goal is to destroy them with mouse clicks. But with difficult clicks. Before clicking the mouse, you must hold down the key with the corresponding keyboard letter. The game will be over as soon as the letters fly past you.

name: The Red Selene
description: The new genre of sci-fi horror survival and all-out action is now with your beloved pixel-art classic games. Grab the top weapons, and resources and use them in the modern combat system with a traditional and retro vibe, Immerse yourself in the huge hand-drawn environments with massive details.

name: House of Lies
description: Explore the House of Lies in this first-person survival horror game. Solve puzzles and scavenge for resources as you use your survival skills to navigate through terrifying environments and enemies to unravel the truth behind the mystery.

name: Violent Selection
description: Is Mr. Venturi just a subject of study, or is he something else? Violent Selection is a bloody top-down shooter where you may find this out by surviving a series of challenging levels from the T.R.A.U.M.A. Unnatural Selection Case Study #9.

name: Van Hellswing
description: In Van Hellswing, we combine explosive movement with a retro look to bring you a shooter straight out of hell! Keep moving to show those leeches not to mess with Van Hellswing!

name: Brave Bubble Heart
description: In Brave Bubble Heart, you'll face strange creatures and solve puzzles while saving as many souls as you can that are lost in the abyss. Your life is your ammunition. Do not die!

name: Mix the Forgotten
description: A narrative puzzle crafting adventure set in a world where everyone and everything is something. Through Mix the Forgotten's surreal adventure you'll befriend everyone you can with the power of crafting and help them find meaning and move on to an unknown destination.

name: Vivian Carmine
description: In an average town somewhere in America, a disturbance has been felt. Vivian Carmine and her badge, Nicholas, have come from the Gap Between Worlds to investigate.

name: Iterazers
description: Battle against enemy AI in a shooter battle! Adjust the parameters through customization and aim for victory with your own ultimate bullet!

name: Nature Escapes 3
description: Nature Escapes 3 is fun, relaxing, and beautiful hidden object game!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Malaysia
description: Puzzles of Malaysia!

name: A Hint of Purple
description: A short visual novel about queer love and art. Follow Maya, a once-celebrated painter now paralyzed, as she struggles to accept her new reality and its effects on her relationship. Argue with your Prefrontal Cortex, insult an art critic, befriend the elderly.

name: Arcane Revolt
description: Arcane Revolt is an action role-playing game with pixel graphics. Lead a revolution as a powerful mage against tyrants in a fantasy medieval world. Customize your spells and make decisions that will benefit your cause in battle. Improve your spells, start the rebellion, and bring down the order!

name: The Happies: Doomsday Stories
description: Build ships, assemble crews, evacuate the planet from disaster. Conquer space, explore a universe full of dangers: aggressive ufos, ravenous space piranhas or deadly radiation. Find your way, fight battles and if you can survive, find a new home. Indie casual strategy card game.

name: D-World Gate
description: A roguelite game where the player controls the actions and the character automatically attacks. Control the brave with different talents, survive the fight with monsters and enrich their own profession composition, become a master of all profession, defeat the Kings of the undead in this world.

name: Minesweeper Girl
description: This is a minesweeping game.

name: Spiritless Ltd.
description: Do you sometimes hear scratching, scraping or rumbling noises? Then you might have a poltergeist in your home. But don’t panic. Spiritless Ltd. is here to help you and expel the ghost from your home.

name: I Commissioned Some Dogs 2
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many dogs and bones as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 15 art pieces to choose from, and 1500+ hidden objects, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: The Abandoned Presence
description: The Abandoned Presence is a gritty and challenging Metroidvania set in a world heavily inspired by India's urban heritage and industrial core. Search for answers as Zoe; wield industrial weapons, traverse city skylines, and take on elite enemies to uncover the secrets of The Abandoned Presence.

name: Otherworld Legends: Anibella
description: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends on Steam in order to play.

name: Kessler Syndrome
description: Alone in orbit with a corpse and no way to reach Earth, play as an astronaut who must keep a defunct space station aloft. Maintain the onboard systems, deal with the constant threat of space junk, and navigate the dark halls in zero-gravity. Day by day more systems fail, and the void draws closer.

name: Metal Ape
description: Metal Ape is a 2D souls-like metroidvania game where you play as a cyborg exploring a treacherous world filled with deadly enemies and dark secrets. Master brutal combat, wield powerful abilities, and journey deep into the abyss in search of the truth.

name: Run Tank Run
description: Drive your tank, blast everything blocking your way, and rush forward with exhilaration.

name: The Lost Moon
description: The Lost Moon is an Adventurous Online Multiplayer Coop game where your group of future Astronauts are on a mission to solve the mystery of the failed Moon missions. But be aware or your surroundings, we can never be sure what is really going on up there...

name: Delusion Out of Space
description: Delusion Out of Space is an atmospheric first-person science fiction adventure game with an unforgettable story, a unique world, and supernatural alien technologies.

name: WarBots
description: This is a platformer, 2D MOBA game with shooting robots.An 5v5 PvP arena where the goal is to destroy the enemy team's core. You can customize your equipment, which you can acquire by reaching higher levels.While you're dead, you control a small but deadly drone.

name: The Chef's Shift
description: The Chef’s Shift is a fast-paced typing game in a restaurant setting, where you’ll both cook & serve food to hungry customers, all done by TYPING.

name: Mystery Case Files: The Last Resort
description: A ski resort high in the mountains hides a dark past!

name: Steel Republic: Rail Defender
description: SRRD is a hybrid of Strategy Railroad Logistics, Resource gathering, Base building, and Tower Defense

name: Town of Ancient Tea
description: Live in the town of Ancient Tea and enjoy a Tang Dynasty-style country life—live off the land, handcraft teas, make delicacies like Mapo Tofu. When Yin and Yang are in balance, even the fairies will celebrate traditional Chinese festivals with you! The hidden wonders of Yin-Yang Market is revealing.

name: Skeleton Hotel
description: Skeleton Hotel is a single player survival board game inspired by the Resident Evil and Silent Hill series, with an emphasis on inventory management and replayability. Featuring 1 compact story mode, more than 20 crazy characters, 6 killer transformations, obtainable S rank, and tons of unlockables.

name: Gatekeeper: Infinity
description: Prologue version of the game Gatekeeper. Gatekeeper: Infinity is a fast-paced rogue-lite shooter where you'll search for the stolen Heart of the Universe and battle machine enemies! Play solo or join forces with friends in co-op mode.

name: Muted
description: Muted is a social thriller where you're taking the role of a single mother hunted by government. You need to craft diapers in slums of a dystopian city.

name: In Freedom Rest Ideal Tomorrows
description: Lead your group of warriors in a unique country (procedurally generated), where looting cities and facing guards is just the beginning. With each victory, increase your power, preparing to face the king and take control of the area. Are you ready to go for the victory?

name: Reincarnation
description: Reincarnation is a medieval/fantasy themed turn-based RPG card game with unique deck-building, character development and class selection experiences. Devise your attack and defense strategies to defeat monsters and gain rewards. Join the action-packed world of Reincarnation today!

name: Drone Operator
description: Drone Operator is a game where you will use civilian drones to conduct military operations against an overwhelming occupying force. Use your technical skills to turn harmless flying toys into deadly weapons, and outsmart your enemy. But remember - stay vigilant.

name: Ashes to Ashes
description: Shoot your way to vengeance as the infamous undead gunslinger Quinn Del Ramo. In this weird wild west, experience a story-driven action-packed adventure with bullets, magic, and betrayal.

name: Rich Dad Simulator
description: Run your own chain of markets. Start from a small shop to the biggest business in town. Manage staff, control inventory, set prices, and keep customers happy. Build new locations and expand your retail empire. Can you succeed and become the king of retail?

name: Homicipher
description: Homicipher is an adventure horror game where you’ll decipher a language, fall in love and escape. Players will face various horrifying men in this strange world. Your aim is to decipher their language and eventually find a way to escape. Meanwhile, a peculiar feeling also starts to bloom.

name: Labophobia
description: Labophobia is a 2D horror game where you play as a scientist trying to escape from a laboratory while avoiding a monster. Navigate through 50 rooms with unique mechanics to continue your escape. Face three bosses in a unique horror gaming experience.

name: Hidden Through Time 2: Myths & Magic
description: Join Clicky on a new, enchanted adventure in Hidden Through Time 2: Myths & Magic! Search for hidden objects scattered around hand-drawn worlds, and unlock more as you go. With both a single player campaign and an online mode where you can create your own dreamworld, the adventure never ends!

name: Exclusion
description: One day, the protagonist happens to be on a train that has a train accident. The accident, which made national headlines, set off a chain of tragedies for those who were also present. Who is the victim and who is the perpetrator?

name: The Paper Arcade
description: The Paper Arcade is a collection of classic arcade-style games with a unique drawing and sketchbook aesthetic. Enjoy fast-paced, high-score chasing action, challenging puzzles, and casual games. Each game is brought to life with stunning hand-drawn graphics. Addictive, retro-style gaming fun!

name: American Airport Simulator
description: It's the early 90-ties near Aspen. Transform a former military base into a small airport. Maybe, with time, even an international one. Renovate, improve, serve customers and watch out for suspicious old ladies with a dog in a bag....

name: Madhouse Madness
description: A journalist decides to explore an abandoned mental hospital with a dark history of housing some of the most notorious patients in history. As the journalist explores, they encounter the unique and terrifying stories of each ghost, driven by their own individual mental illnesses.

name: Nocturia The Game
description: From a child's perspective, we will dare to cross in solitude the dark and vast spaces of a house haunted by an entity of ambivalent intentions that we will discover during our mission: to go to the bathroom in the middle of the night.

name: Magecraft
description: Annihilate hordes of mobs and challenging bosses with the ultimate Spell Building system. Infinitely customize your weapons and see how quickly you can break your computer! Abuse the open-ended nature of the spell creation system to destroy the game balance.

name: Rebound Gun
description: "Rebound Gun" is an indie game with shooting and bullet rebound as its main theme. In the game, players will play as the protagonist Hyakka, exploring the imaginative world during sleepless nights.

name: Into Samomor
description: A psychological horror action RPG where everyone can be eliminated and your choices change the entire plot.

name: Chrono Crystal
description: Chrono Crystal is a tower defense game. Spanning across 5 major regions with the Prince and facing numerous challenges, an unprecedented great war is about to break out. Build your towers, upgrade your heroes, and defend your crystal against waves of enemies—until the countdown timer runs out!

name: Alien Boom Boom
description: Join the fight against an alien invasion in this fast-paced, old-school FPS. Battle in your hometown, around the world, and even in space. Take on unique enemies and wield powerful weapons, all with a touch of classic fps sensibility. Can you save humanity from the brink of destruction? Boom boom.

name: Behold Battle
description: Guess which army will win, and watch them fight for your amusement. Behold Battle is a simple auto battler, where you see heroes and monsters fight to the death in randomly generated battles.

name: Own the Throne
description: Own the Throne is an open-world, action-adventure RPG that combines your Nightmares with your ordinary city life. The strong minded will gain special power nightmare use and succeed in the City. Get rich in the city and live with the curse of the Sword by Owning the throne in your Nightmares.

name: Project Bonsai
description: Complete objectives in a fast paced roguelite game, where you must escape the island and find the mysterious Bonsai Tree.

name: Laser Tanks
description: Laser Tanks is a fast-paced Top Down RPG shooter game where you battle hordes of alien monsters and bosses in various environments using advanced weapons and laser tanks. The game features unique monsters, numerous weapons, and different laser tanks to operate.

name: Trepidation
description: An open world looter shooter. Shoot, loot, and defend yourself against others in a post catastrophic mountain environment!

name: Danger is Near
description: Danger is Near - sessional hardcore multiplayer shooter that includes several genres: FPS, survival, weapon and combat simulator, RPG with MMO phenomena. The game will immerse you in a realistic gaming environment imbued with a gloomy post-apocalyptic atmosphere...

name: RC Revolution
description: Get ready for RC Revolution, the remote control racing game with intense action, realistic physics, and a variety of customization options. Compete in real-time PvP races, join tournaments, and climb online leaderboards. Customize your vehicles and create your own tracks. Are you ready to race?

name: Dating Izzie
description: Dating Izzie is a charming adult-only puzzle game that follows the story of Izzie, an intelligent and curious woman with a love for all things geeky.

name: Solo Hunt: Ten Floor
description: Solo Hunt: Ten Floor is a rogue-like action rpg dungeon crawler with ten treacherous levels filled with fearsome monsters, deadly traps, and puzzles to be solved.

name: On the Other Side
description: Take on the role of a modern exorcist in this realistic ghost hunting horror. You have to fulfill contracts related to paranormal phenomena. Your main weapon is an old camera that can shoot what is not visible to the human eye.

name: Swap
description: Swap is a simple yet brutally difficult game that will frustrate and personally insult you. Hone your reflexes and steel your emotions to uncover an unexpected story... Or just give up now and save us all some time, the choice is yours.

name: Deco Deck
description: Deco Deck is a new logic puzzle from the creator of Semantle. Your goal is to link the cards on the board in connected groups of five, such that each group makes a valid "hand".

name: The Last Golden Fox
description: Protect the last golden fox at all costs! Fight against hordes of monsters and prevent them from taking the precious fox through the portal. Be quick and strategic with your slingshot in this epic battle for the survival of the Golden Fox. Will you be able to defend it or will it become extinct?

name: Alnico Smithery
description: Alnico Smithery is a hand-drawn, physics-based forging simulator. Mine for ore, smelt ingots, discover alloys, forge tools, and rebuild the smithery your grandfather left behind.

name: Patchwork Beast
description: A seemingly sentient beast made of haphazardly welded parts has awakened and is rotting the forest from the inside out with metallic Corrosion. You are a visiting traveler who may be the key to stopping this evil before it turns the land barren. Can you stop the Corrosion before it's too late?

name: Perfect Dice
description: A card-based roguelike game where all decisions are made through dice rolls. Assemble a deck of special cards and dice, skillfully manipulate randomness, defeat enemies, and find the Perfect Dice to help you regain your free will.

name: Tuttle: Star Flower Harvest
description: Tuttle: Star Flower Harvest: become a space flower farmer, fight off pests, learn new skills, and find out the secrets of the Starflowers! Your actions shape the Galaxies. Dig in now!

name: Only Up!
description: Embark on an exciting journey in Only UP! Exploring a huge world full of secrets and mysteries, you have to get as high as possible, and the most interesting starts above the clouds...

name: Mad Aliens: Seeking the Soul
description: A wacky and humorous 2D platform game that takes you on an intergalactic adventure! Inspired by classic 80's cartoons, this game is sure to delight players of all ages with its charming visuals and original soundtrack.

name: Candlelight: Lament
description: Ed broke the curfew to visit his friends in order to find out the truth of his granddaughter's disappearance, but the truth was far more terrible than he thought.

name: Aniwars
description: Join one of the three warring factions and utilize their unique commanders, units and abilities to dominate the battlefield! Aniwars is a turn-based PvP strategy game with high impact moves and fast-paced gameplay!

name: Clawed Cult
description: Clawed Cult is a roguelite bullet heaven with cute cultist animals invoking their elder god, Catchulhu. Guide them through challenging battles with powerful abilities and strategy to emerge victorious. With intense action and stunning art, it's a must-play for fans of games who love a challenge!

name: Hentai Beach Memories
description: Hentai Beach Memories is a relaxing puzzle game. Flip tiles and find their match to reveal the sexy maid art beneath. 20 beautiful girls are waiting for you.

name: WhiteClothes
description: WhiteClothes is a RPG in which you play cute monsters on their mission to uphold peace!

name: Internull
description: After waking up in the facilities of a once-successful tech company, you must find your way out and uncover the mysteries of Internull with your only tool being a Virtual Reality Headset.

name: Hyper HitBoxing
description: Enter the boxing ring and become a Champion! With strategic bobbing and weaving, you can dodge incoming attacks and land knockout punches that will leave your opponents reeling. Make sure to manage your stamina levels wisely to ensure victory. Are you ready to punch your way to the top?

name: Blue Maiden
description: Blue Maiden is a psychological horror game that takes place in a traditional Japanese neighborhood.

name: Tamas Awakening
description: Tamas Awakening is a 2D visual novel where you play as a young psychologist who obtains a mysterious power to hypnotize people. You use this power to fuck all the girls around you, especially those who live with you. This game features lots and lots of impregnation and breeding dirty talk.

name: Xon
description: Create and control your own world in Xon, a real-time god game. Use powerful miracles to shape the land, guide your people, and build structures. Play with or against other players to compete for victory and gain points for your accomplishments. Will you be the one to lead your people to glory?

name: SpikerMan X
description: The evil alien lizard Kromatone has returned to try and take over the galaxy! And he’s brought several of his former partners in crime to help him succeed! It’s up to SpikerMan to defeat all the crime bosses and defeat Kromatone himself before he takes over everything!

name: Amber's Tale
description: Embark on a thrilling journey of self-discovery in a world where magic reigns and humanity has crumbled, as you traverse through challenging environments and uncover the truth behind your lost memories in this dynamic metroidvania game.

name: Seonbi: Scholar of Joseon
description: Seonbi: Scholar of Joseon is a side-scrolling action rogue-lite game that features an unnamed scholar who want to correct the chaos in the Joseon Dynasty after the end of the Imjin War.

name: Arcane Warlords
description: Arcane Warlords is a tactical auto-battler featuring mass units, where the kingdom's fate is shaped by your choices and strategies. Upgrade your skills, legion and stronghold to prepare for epic battles unlike any you've seen before. Your legion awaits – can you gain control of the kingdom?

name: That Potato Game
description: Explore life as a potato and roll your way through the cozy, mystical home of Hilbert. Complete puzzles, gain abilities, and find hidden secrets within!

name: The Outsiders
description: Outsiders is an 80's inspired horror experience with asymmetric multiplayer game modes, along with a full single player story mode.

name: Dunland: Survivors Story
description: In this fantasy world overrun by monsters, survive and thrive in this roguelike game. Drawing inspiration from Vampires Survivors, enjoy a gripping story and challenging gameplay mechanics.

name: Vampire Memories
description: Introduction: In STG's game, recall one story after another with simple descriptions;

name: Lab.Ar
description: Narrative sci-fi horror quest. Travel to the mysterious research center as a Dr. Robert O`Neil on his mission to reveal old secrets of Howard Deus, the renowned researcher of cancer who died by mystical circumstances.

name: CargoSpace
description: Deliver packages in a world torn by goddesses. Working for Cargon they guarantee your package will arrive no matter what hazards!

name: Zoid Zoid Tetsoidea
description: Zoid Zoid Tetsoidea is a recreation of "Defenders of Tetsoidea", with new and improved visuals. Join Leira and Tens as they fight against a corporation intent on destroying the world by making a commodity out of the sacred "fateholder crystals".

name: Cast Out Colony
description: Cast Out Colony combines roguelite and bullet-heaven action with robust town-building elements. Choose from various characters, fight hordes of foes, and grow your colony, which in return grows your stats, offering a unique twist on the survival genre.

name: Profi Girls
description: We, girls of different professions, are looking for a boss. A boss should be tough but gentle, decisive and firm... Among us there is a brave firefighter, a sweet cook, a dreamy stewardess and others. Keep in mind that we need a real boss whom we would like to obey!

name: Elena's Journal: To Atlantis
description: Discover the lost secrets of Atlantis in this Time Management Adventure!

name: Furry Femboys
description: Furry Femboys... Your dream coming true...

name: Falling Into Dreams
description: Can you uncover the secrets of Dreams?...Platform your way in the wildest nightmares imaginable to the bosses that remind you something about your past...But, to end it all you need to fight with s̷̉ŏ̸̤m̸̖̓ẽ̸̯ṱ̶̓h̴̗͝i̷̻͆ng that has been stuck in your brain for long, long time...

name: Red Sunrise
description: Red Sunrise is a shooter that tells about military conflicts in different parts of the world. The player, in the role of a mercenary, will have to perform various combat missions of private military companies and government agencies and other organizations in hot spots around the world

name: Pungolo: A Prickly Adventure
description: Pungolo is a unique adventure game that offers players a one-of-a-kind experience. With its beautiful graphics, challenging levels, and unique gameplay, Pungolo is sure to captivate players of all ages. So why wait? Grab your roots and explore the magical world of Pungolo today!

name: Subcrew
description: Gather your crew of 1 to 10 players and dive into fear while uncovering the secrets of the deep. The fate of your mission and crew rests on your decisions. In this heart-pumping journey full of adrenaline, danger, and excitement at every turn, will you fight or hide?

name: A Shadow of Time
description: Embark on an immersive journey in A Shadow of Time, a stunning 3rd-person exploration game. Traverse breathtaking landscapes, solve puzzles, and follow a mysterious voice that shares personal stories as you uncover hidden secrets and restore time to the world in this captivating adventure.

name: Soulbound
description: A Retro-modern roguelie adventure for 1-2 players. Enjoy responsive and skillful combat. Upgrade, unlock and progress. Fight curious enemies and meet charming friends. Embark on a strange adventure!

name: Awita: Journey of Hope
description: Awita: journey of hope is side-scroller metroidvania about a girl who saves her village from a terrible epidemic. She has to explore the big dangerous world, meet new friends and enemies and find out the secrets of the kingdom.

name: Foxnox
description: Explore the world as a little fox. Be careful, this adventure will not be easy!

name: HatLand
description: HatLand is a game where you need to see GAME OVER many times to complete a level. But each time, passing further along the inner corridors of the Empire's spaceships, you will become stronger ...

name: Animal Jigsaw VR
description: Animal Jigsaw VR is a relaxing 3D puzzle game about putting together realistic animals. Unlock animals and learn their fascinating stories. Immerse yourself in nature and gain a deeper understanding of the complex rules that govern the animal kingdom in a variety of environments.

name: Real Nightmares
description: Real Nightmares is a mystery and puzzle game, where the protagonist wakes up in a dream that soon becomes a nightmare, and your goal is to find out what is happening and unravel the protagonist's past, Can you? There are many scenarios that change as the player delights in the history of the game.

name: Goblin Down
description: An adult visual novel with a fantasy, goblin, and NTR/netorare (cheating) theme.

name: Destroy All Zombies
description: Zombies again......

name: Bifröst: Through the Realms
description: Bifröst: Through the Realms is a fast-paced multidimensional platformer with Norse and Sci-Fi themes. Use the power of the Bifröst to save the realms from Ragnarök.

name: Brain Show
description: Compete with your friends in brand new quiz game. Take part in crazy TV Show. Dynamite explosions, sobbing mates, ruined friendships! Sounds like fun? It will be – with Brain Show!

name: Cyber Heart
description: Cyber Heart is a single-player, story-driven mech shooter where you, a commander, ride your customizable mech through an open world to fight against enemy AI machines.

name: Wild Americas
description: Lose yourself in the lush forests of Mountain Island. Wild Americas is a 3rd person top-down exploratory, survival-adventure game fused with action and RPG elements that takes players on a journey from the highest mountain peaks to the depths of abandoned mining tunnels.

name: Eraser Advent
description: It's a simple little game, but this eraser can drive you crazy. Just give it a try.

name: Crystal of Atlantis
description: Years ago, a visitor from another world foresaw doom for a certain civilization on Earth. To save its people, he gave them a child to be raised among them, hoping his knowledge and insight would be enough to save them from their fate. Play a thrilling Match-3 game and help to save the earth!

name: Danger in Body
description: With vivid and exciting graphics, a pulsating soundtrack, and addictive gameplay, "Danger in Body" is a game that will keep you entertained and hooked for hours on end. You are the last hope of the human body - so get ready to fight for your right to live!

name: LUS: Last Unit Standing
description: A new platform game that combines 2D style with 3D in a post apocalyptic world.

name: Rustil: Eternal Labyrinth Castle
description: In a randomly changing labyrinth castle, Rustil aims for the top floor. An exhilarating roguelike action game in which players aim to reach the top floor while efficiently strengthening the main character by acquiring abilities from the souls of heroes.

name: Explorer: Golden Empire
description: A group of young people form an adventurer team from their hometown, exploring the world while meeting new companions, learning various skills, and ultimately finding the legendary story of the Golden Empire.

name: Pixel Survivor
description: A pixel survivor rogue-lite that will give you a hypnotic addiction! You do all the usual "Survivor" stuff, but this time you'll have to hire a therapist in order to stop playing!

name: My Motel
description: Welcome to My Motel Simulator, the ultimate simulation game where you get to design and manage your own motel! Your goal is to create a successful and profitable motel by designing and decorating each room, attracting guests.

name: As Crônicas de Mar Céu
description: Game inspired by the book "As Crônicas de Mar Céu". It is turn-based, adventure and fantasy, played by different characters in a vast world with magic, wars and animations. It has from its comic and humorous side, to its more serious and emotional side. A game made for everyone!

name: Life Saver
description: Earth is on the verge of World War 3. All life as we know it will be gone tomorrow. Take control of "Super Star Dan" to build a super SSD that can store every DNA on earth before the world goes up in flames. "Life Saver" is a twin stick shooter that you don't want to miss out on!

name: Rainbow Rendezvous
description: Rainbow Rendezvous is a delightful and colorful cartoon-style endless runner game

name: Wings of Angels
description: Fun, romance, drama, and sexy moments with the beautiful babes of "Wings of Angels", a science fiction Visual Novel featuring some of the hottest co-pilots you'll ever fly with.

name: Squid Grid
description: Welcome to Squid Grid! A free puzzle challenge about a squid on a grid. Unique sokoban mechanics, cute art, and hand-crafted levels will give you a puzzle experience you won't forget. Get Squid Griddin'!

name: Here There Be Bears
description: Here There Be Bears puts the player in the head of Sam, a 20 something dealing with after effects of a caving accident years prior. Or did she actually ever escape the cave?

name: Quantum of Soul
description: Quantum of Soul is a tab-targeting online RPG enriched with tactical card game combat. Travel the universe, complete missions, and fight in the arena while gathering cards. Expand your card collection, build your deck, and adapt it to the challenges.

name: Bullet Time Battle
description: Bullet Time Battle is a FPS that adds precision to combat against enemy forces with bullet time. Experience an explosive gameplay as you plant/defuse bomb or capture/defend flags while battling enemies. Are you ready?

name: Idle Catfarmia
description: Help the cat fairies to arrange resources, produce and harvest crops, and manage the farm. The more efficiently the farm grows, the richer your pockets become. Show some clicking skills to unwelcome visitors who occasionally appear on the farm.

name: ZooHop
description: Blast your way to the finish with an arsenal of weaponry in this 2D platformer. Race against the clock collecting medals or test your might against "The Tower" to see who can be the fastest to the top!

name: D.O.R.F. Real-Time Strategic Conflict
description: Take command of one of three unique factions and conquer your enemies in a twisted vision of the future. Construct sprawling bases, scour the land for resources to mine and refine, and assemble powerful armies of land, air and sea units to smash your adversaries with.

name: SynthFight
description: Synthfight is a local 2v2 arena battle game designed to test your teamwork and tactics. Battle your friends and see who can clutch the narrow victory.

name: Ignistone
description: Ignistone is a roguelike game in which players must devise a combination of weapons and amulets to progress through a dungeon. Whether you prefer attack power, durability, or special moves, find the combination that suits you best.

name: Gladiators Tale
description: Welcome to the brutal world of Gladiator's Tale, where you must fight tooth and nail to earn your freedom. In this immersive game, you'll encounter a wide range of characters - some will become your allies, while others will try to sabotage you. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Adventures of Ben: Rabbit Run
description: World of Valentardia will not let you get bored for a second! Adventures will require the hero to be not only determined but also to be faithfully accepted.

name: The Tenants: Pets
description: Experience the joy of bringing people and pets together in this delightful expansion for The Tenants. Build your property empire with a pet-friendly approach, and watch your business thrive as you satisfy animal lovers in Wondersville!

name: Cabin Rush
description: Explore and gather resources to build traps, towers, and walls to protect your cabin from increasingly difficult waves of monsters.

name: Bor Dungeon
description: Smashing your way across dark dungeons with your huge hammer to destroy all your enemies and obtain legendary loots in this cute top-down action/platformer rpg.

name: Castlewatch
description: Castlewatch is a classical Tower Defense Game

name: The Moonflower
description: The Moonflower is a cooperative horror-survival video game the game is set in an abandoned forest island, where there is the known demon "Moonflower" and the players will have to block it as much as possible / hunt it via an underground laboratory.

name: Wisplight
description: Be the monster and defend your land against human invaders and settlers. Amass your forces, fortify your base, raid human enemy settlements, unlock multiple transformations, and engage in a compelling story with multiple endings. All these, and more, in Wisplight!

name: NeverHome: Hall of Apathy
description: Use your wits to solve puzzles and escape from an abstract world in this hand-drawn atmospheric horror game

name: Mort's Dream Jump
description: Join Mort in a dreamlike adventure through challenging levels, using a variety of movement-based powerups to help him overcome each obstacle!

name: Unfortunate Tales of Violet
description: Help the incompetent witch Violet save her homeland in this unfortunate, fast-paced, action adventure title. Draw runes to orchestrate your magic, expand your arsenal of spells, and travel a strange land full of whimsical characters. Oh and also don't mind the owl's jokes, he's always like this.

name: Argumentum Ad Culpam
description: Argumentum Ad Culpam is a gothic visual novel about the world of eternal agony. Capricious dance of principles and death. Take part in twisted battles of wits where morality is only an instrument to survive and decide what future that world will have.

name: Hungry Adventurer
description: Help hungry ninjas survive their starvation and face various enemies in this foodnastic platformer! Are you ready to collect some food? Be careful food is very addictive!

name: Infested Lands
description: Infested Lands is an addictive game that takes players to a dangerous world where monsters rule. The player takes on the role of a military man who has been sent to a territory known as the "Infested Lands"

name: Vacation Adventures: Cruise Director 8 - Collector's Edition
description: TWO Cruises to 4 Awesome Continents of the World

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 2 - Episode 04
description: Season 2 Episode 4: Carcaptors! Mini, having spent all night pacing the streets of Hella City, embarks on a half-baked while half-asleep plan for revenge.

name: ArchOlden
description: ArchOlden is a meditative puzzle-city-builder.

name: Materialization of Memories
description: Materialization of Memories is a Survival Horror game where you can never be sure you are in control of the situation. The materialisation zone has many surprises in store for you.

name: Far Tale
description: Narrative role-playing game in the world of slavic dark fantasy. You have to take on the role of a father who must guide his daughter to distant lands. A cruel world, terrible monsters, witchcraft, and even time itself will stand in your way.

name: Inferno Quest: Journey Through the Lava Cavern
description: Inferno Quest is an old-school single-player action-style obstacle/puzzle game. Can your drone make it through the four levels of the lava caves and make it to the Tomb Shade to bargain for your freedom?

name: Dolven
description:
Dolven is a fantasy turn-based strategy RPG with a deep card-based battle system. Following the events of The Necromancer’s scourge upon the northern townsfolk, guide a band of mercenaries through the Decaying Isles in order to rid the land of evil. Use the Pillars to create a variety of combos to earn mana and gain advantage over the recent evil plaguing the land of Dolven.

Card battles include hand-to-hand combat, where the cards provide characters with additional skills. The Pillars allow you to create various hand combinations that range from matching cards and suits, playing a pivotal role in your quest to accumulate more Mana, Gear, Cards, Skills and even exerting influence over the game's environment. Strategic planning is of utmost importance.

name: Nine-Tailed Okitsune Tale
description: Fluffy x Kawaii! A Japanese-style action RPG where the character changes into various forms to solve anomalies that occur in the capital!

name: Harpy Raiders
description: Stick, stretch, squish and slide your way to success in this Slime-based action platformer! Maybe cause some International Incidents along the way. All Glory to the Slime Army!

name: Ultranova
description: Action-packed, sci-fi platformer where you play as Nova, a cyborg with extraordinary technological abilities. Features beautiful low-poly visuals and a retro-inspired space synth soundtrack blending retro with modern gameplay, graphics, music, and effects.

name: Friday
description: Friday - Top Down game, which is not so easy to win. You have to collect the skulls in the trunk of the car. Giant hands and zombies can be a big problem. Use bombs and kill zombies. Today your collection of skulls will replenish quickly

name: Rise of Jericho
description: Lead hunter-gatherers and give rise to human civilization in Jericho, the oldest city in the world. Gather resources, craft tools and build structures to protect villagers and make your city thrive.

name: Cyber Strider
description: Blast your enemies! Create the ultimate build! Travel to the edge of space, in this epic rogue-lite action packed bundle of chaos inspired by slay the spire & FTL.

name: Mystic Mischief
description: Fly as Mammon the chaotic thieving bird as he attempts to achieve the biggest heist of his life. Poop, caw, and steal your way through his adventures. Avoid the dangerous dragons as they try to keep you from stealing their treasures.

name: Shred-A-Bunch!
description: Shred zombies in slow-mo while drifting with your good old tractor?! Harvest crops, slaughter zombies, overcome epic boss fights and upgrade your vehicle. Rinse and repeat.

name: Ants in Space!
description: Create new, unique species of Space Ants and repel much stronger invaders! Explore vast procedurally generated micro-universes, conquer planets, and mess with nature itself in this mix of Roguelike and Strategy.

name: VR Tractor Farming
description: Immersive experience in "Farming Tractor" VR game that lets you tractor driving and farming activity in open world like growing crops, feeding animals, and watering plants, modern drone farming and drive through risky road. Day & night view experience the farming in darkness, rain and a full moon.

name: Bike Offroad Simulator
description: The Bike Offroad Simulator is a racing-simulation game that puts you to the test again.

name: Roma Incognita
description: Roma Incognita is a thrilling stealth tactics game. Sneak your way through cities, country villas, and enemy camps hidden in the woods, setting traps, and avoiding detection. With a team of specialists and countless ways to overcome any obstacle, the choice is yours.

name: Polygeddon: Survive
description: You are on an island where everyone wants to kill you, ranging from weather conditions to dangerous enemies, your goal is to survive. Survive alone or together. Build, craft, grow, explore, fight!

name: Potion Slingers
description: Potion Slingers is a turn-based battle card game for two to four players. Compete to be the last one standing in a spectator packed marketplace arena!

name: Aliens Tower Defense
description: Sometimes it's better to prevent something that might happen...

name: Gaia Trek
description: In "Gaia Trek", you will play as Gaia, the shattered will of a planet, and command your spaceship to explore new worlds, collect and refine various resources, build a home on the damaged spacecraft, summon a wide range of monsters, and ultimately, devour other shattered wills to repair yourself.

name: Rhythm Realm
description: The lizardman mob boss condemned your village to a slow, catchy death. One boy, one sword: do you have what it takes to venture through this magical world of music and save them all?

name: Lunar Legacy
description: Romantic Visual Novel. Unjustly accused of a terrible crime, Soyeon finds herself in the Kingdom of Spirits. How will she survive in a strange and incomprehensible world? How much can one trust the suspiciously friendly spirits?

name: Spriters, Hopes Blooming Dawn
description: Spriters: Hopes Blooming Dawn is an RPG-style game that takes you on an epic adventure through a world filled with magic, mystery, and danger. Battle dangerous creatures, collect Gems with unique powers, and uncover the mysteries of your past in this engaging and innovative game.

name: Touhou: Gensokyo Survivors
description: Youkai have overrun Gensokyo! There's no resolving this incident, just try to survive! Touhou: Gensokyo Survivors is the latest take on the survivor genre, this time with the unique twist of a grid-based inventory system. Hoard as many items as possible if you want to survive!

name: Cordelia
description: Spring into adventure with Cordelia and her heart in a retro fantasy adventure. Gain powerful items and defeat ice cold enemies in a world that change each run. Use heartwarming love to traverse treacherous lands.

name: Time Limit Harvest
description: This is a farming game where you compete to see how much money you can make within a time limit. You can get seeds and videos for each level.

name: Year 500
description: Year 500 is a third-person, hack-n-slash adventure game featuring swordplay, magic casting, and an engaging story set in a fantasy world. Reclaim your memory, oppose and defeat evil, and save the kingdom by any means necessary.

name: Medieval Simulators: Baker
description: A relaxing simulator for lovers of the Middle Ages and nature. You take on the role of a medieval baker who has to earn coins, improve his own farm, harvest wheat, grind grain, chop wood and bake...

name: Shattered: The Final Days
description: An open world survival mmo, set 50 years after a viral outbreak that took out 90% of the world's population. Now you must choose your next path of survival, whether you go solo or join forces with other survivors.

name: Our Life: Beginnings & Always - Baxter's Story
description: Enjoy exciting summer days in the company of Baxter Ward during Steps 3 and 4! This is an optional DLC for the free game Our Life: Beginnings & Always.

name: Wayward Rose
description: An indie thriller that will test your navigational skills as you find your way out of darkness and into light.

name: Nifa's First Mission
description: It's up to the young knight Nifa to save her village! Will she be able to do it?

name: Family Bash
description: Family Bash tells the timeless story of the Family – the one we love, cherish, insult and despise.

name: Mouse Trap
description: Mouse Trap is back with a snap! It’s the chaotic board game you remember, on your mobile! Join your friends and race to collect the most cheese.

name: Manic Miner
description:
It’s 1983 and a peerless new home computer game graces the scene. Its stand-out features include its quirky humour, in-game music / effects, high replay value and well-designed colourful graphics.

Roll forward 35 years and kick nostalgia into overdrive with the release of the Manic Miner app. A perfectly formed replica of the much-loved home computer game, with 3D voxel-style graphics.

name: Lovecraft's Mythos Run
description: LLC Blini Games have developed Lovecraft’s Mythos Run, an entertaining free to play 2D action endless runner with pixel art graphics based on their original roguelike multiplatform game, Lovecraft’s Untold Stories.

name: Sausage Wars: Deadly Levels
description:
Trigger the trapdoors and watch the suckers fall into the toxic soup!
Wait for the right moment, push the sausage homies in the fire and watch them cook well!
Escape from imminent death, find the safe spot and push other sausages into the laser beam!

With this DLC pack you will get access to 3 new stages in each local multiplayer mode.

name: Donkey Racing
description: Retro arcade racing game.

name: Skyline Blade
description: Amongst miles of cacti, sand, and bones lies the Skyline pilot training facility. Rumors persist about what goes on behind closed doors at the carefully guarded facility but all the world really knows is that Skyline generates the best pilots period. Do you have what it takes?

name: BounceBash
description: Grab small stars with the paddle for big bonuses! Snag big stars for awesome new powers that will help Dillo Bash even more! New worlds are revealed as you gain new powers - explore them all! Play to unlock new abilities, then mix and match any four to find your winning combination--over 11,000 combinations of power-ups to choose from!

name: Run Sausage Run: Complete Edition
description:
Complete Edition includes:
- base game with 150 deadly levels, over 80 jucy skins and tasty powerups,
- three new skins: Fly, Cockroach and Plucked Chicken,
- extra 15,000 coins to spend on outfits, powerups, or whatever.

name: Sausage Wars: Trapdoor Hell
description:
Battle other sausages on a new, unstable ground. Trigger the trapdoors and watch the suckers fall into the toxic soup!
With this DLC you will get access to a new Trapdoor stage in each local multiplayer mode.

name: Sausage Wars: Laser Massacre
description:
This is no place to make friends. Escape from imminent death, find the safe spot and push other sausages into the deadly beam!
With this DLC you will get access to a new Laser stage in each local multiplayer mode.

name: Mines of Moria
description: Choose one of six playable classes with a randomly selected race. New players are recommended to play as a Warrior.

name: Tennis Game in Roaring ’20s
description:
Transport yourself back to the 1920s – the golden age of tennis – in Tennis Game in Roaring ’20s (World of Tennis: Roaring ’20s). Join refined ladies and gentlemen partaking in a good old-fashioned battle of wits and skill on the court.
Use swipe or touch controls to place shots and dictate where your player moves. As you play, our new tennis AI system learns your playstyle and can play multiplayer tennis games as you against other players when you are away.
Do you prefer to serve and volley or stick to the baseline and smash powerful forehands? Whatever your style, hit tennis courts and enjoy tactical gameplay while honing your skills. Compete with players from all over the world and become number one tennis champion!

name: Dream Undercity
description:
Legend has it that mysterious treasures are buried deep underground. Are they priceless? Are they magical weapons of extraordinary power? Archaeologists have been working hard on excavating the area to uncover the truth. In attempts to unearth buried treasure, many have built underground cities, revived dinosaurs from their extinction, and trained them to do their bidding. Cities are forming underground, one after another.
However, this new world is incomplete without you. Your subjects and dinosaurs are calling out for a wise master who will guide them through the creation of this underground kingdom.

name: Give a Dam!
description: Sin descripción

name: Street-food Tycoon Chef Fever: World Cook-ing Star
description: Ever dreamed of owning your own food cart business? Now you can! Sell a variety of the world's most popular streetfood--from french fries to hotdogs to fishballs--and work your way towards becoming the next Streetfood Tycoon!

name: Chess Cats
description: Welcome to "Chess Cats" - the ultimate chess experience with cats! Go on a journey to rediscover the beauty of chess as you challenge our adorable cats, each with their own unique look and personality. Dive into a world of strategy and intellect, where you'll not only improve your chess game but also make some furry friends along the way!

name: Standby
description: Standby is easy to pick up but hard to master precise platformer. Challenge your reaction in this fast-paced game and get out of the glitched world. Enjoy smooth controls by dashing through the vibrant levels, crushing and overcoming all the obstacles on your way.

name: Kirby Family
description:
Kirby Family is a game developed by HAL Laboratory featuring characters from the Kirby series, intended to be released in Japan for the Game Boy Color in 2001, but was cancelled before release.

A prototype was later found on 4chan during the 2020 Nintendo gigaleaks, alongside other things in the Game Boy Lot Check.

name: I Commissioned Some Mice
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many mice and cheese as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 15 art pieces to choose from, and 1500+ hidden objects you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Savage Turret
description: Tactical turret placing game with gore, gardening and massive battles. You build the routes for the enemies to facilitate that sweet killzone. And take a break to do some gardening afterwards. Plant on!

name: Fortress of the Undead
description: "Fortress of the Undead" is an intense zombie survival game. Scavenge for weapons and ammo, fight off hundreds or thousands of zombies with up to 4 players, and try to survive as long as possible.

name: Spirit of the Backwaters
description: Get your spirits high and tap into the joys of rural life in this 'Toddy-Tapping' sim! Climb Coconut trees, brew quality Toddy (Palm wine) and turn the local toddy shop into the Backwater region's hottest spot. Watch out, fines and lost licenses are no joke!

name: Highland Panic
description: Highland Panic is a fast-paced, Scottish/Highland-themed card game with solitaire mechanics for 2-4 players. Race to be the first player to play all the cards from you "panic" pile to the common "clan" piles. It's a thrilling game of strategy and skill, perfect for game nights and parties.

name: Therapy Simulator 2023
description: Top-down fast paced game. Find the right person, make the therapist happy

name: The Hero's Way
description: Get ready for battle, hero! Your bravery and strength will be a bulwark in this world of the risen dead, and you will defeat them all!

name: Enemies Defender
description: Attention, attention! Enemies are approaching.

name: Mai and the Legendary Treasure
description: Mai finds a hidden map that brings her to another world. With some newfound friends, Mai sets off to hunt for the legendary treasure! But with rivals in her way, will she finally get her hands on the legendary treasure...?

name: Nightmare: Worlds Collide
description: Nightmare: Worlds Collide is a unique horror experience that follows Jessica Redford as she recalls her memories after a horrific event causes her to lose touch with reality. Throughout the experience you will be unravelling the mystery as she tries to escape her dark inner secrets.

name: Munchy Mammals
description: A puzzle game where you move herbivores and carnivores on a grid to fulfill multiple animal requirements using moving, biting, eating and more.

name: Highrise Guardian
description: Boots on the ground while firing above the cloud! Highrise Guardian is an Arena FPS. Gear up with weapons of your choice, Form the fighting flow with a selection of abilities and perks, dominate your enemies with map control, and make an art-like battle style to become the Anime gunslinger.

name: Castle of Blackwater
description: Castle of Blackwater is a multiplayer social deduction game where 10 players navigate a magical 2D castle while completing tasks and uncovering hidden allegiances. Players are assigned to three different factions, each equipped with unique abilities that support their role in the game. While alive, participants use various tools to gather information and identify threats, while eliminated players can influence the outcome by collecting souls to purchase power-ups for their team. Through alliance-building, deception, and strategic ability usage, players work to ensure their faction's survival and ultimate control of the castle.

name: Snail Bob 3
description: A part that completes the 2012 and 2015 parts and the original 8 parts, with exclusive stages and additions

name: Save King
description: Carefully adjust the force so that the princess does not fall down from the maze to reach the 11th floor. Traps installed throughout the maze interfere with the princess, so it is easy to go to the beginning floor if you do something wrong.

name: Eclectic Expansion Enterprise
description: Expand among the stars! It is 72k years in the future, and a new wave of Human expansion abounds. Join the ranks of the Ecxos, prep star systems for habitation, and develop your tools and ships to enterprise ever faster and further.

name: Aphelion Headhunters
description: Aphelion Headhunters is a Third-Person PVE Hero Shooter featuring two unique player characters, each with their own distinct playstyle, abilities and suite of selectable upgrades.

name: Divine Pearl: Survivors
description: Divine Pearl: Survivors is a bullet heaven survival game set in a shounen anime world, unleash energy wave attacks and increase your power level on each new planet visited!

name: Pigblue
description: A stranger arrives at a quiet and isolated town... Pigblue.

name: Disco Elysium: The Final Cut - Collage Mode
description:
In Collage Mode, players have the ability to create and set the scene in and around Martinaise. They will have full access to characters, environments, effects, and custom dialogue to create the screenshots that they have always desired and fabricate completely new dramas from unforgivable punch-ups to fruity yet forbidden kisses.

Place and Pose – Place, rotate, and resize your favorite characters across the game’s painterly environments and then pick from a range of silly and sensible poses to strike.

Write Dialogue – Create a whole story with a single image by entering custom text that can be placed anywhere and even make it look authentic by using the FELD dialogue reel.

Be Aesthetic – Bring out your inner Art Cop by applying weird and wonderful filters; choosing from rain, fog, and snow; as well changing the time of day to capture the exact mood you’re after.

Stick ‘Em Up – Put gloves and guns in unsuspecting hands with a huge collection of items and clothing stickers or add extra style with new and extraordinary art from our talented collaborators.

Get Framed – Finish up by choosing a frame to wrap up your fantasy with audacious themes such as “Kim Catsuragi,” “F**k The World,” “Visual Calculus,” and “Building Communism.”

Bonus! Secrets to Find – Hunt for never-before-seen scenes from across Martinaise history if you’ve got a keen enough eye for it and enjoy a velvety new voiceover from the game’s narrator.

name: Meet Your Maker: Scorched Necropolis
description: Meet Your Maker's Scorched Necropolis Collection invites players to build and raid Outposts worthy of the Pharaohs themselves. Use ancient-Egyptian-inspired blocks, props, weapons, and Custodian Suits to create and infiltrate monumental tombs unlike any in the wasteland.

name: Infernax: Deux or Die
description:
The update will bring a new playable character into the fray: Cervul the Squire, a well-rounded lad who sports deadly talents in both axe throwing and tool-assisted combat.
