It also incorporates co-op play in Infernax‘s fan-favorite gun mode, perfect for players keen on wielding maximum firepower against the game’s monstrous beasts.

name: Valkyrie Idle
description:
A story of growing up to protect the world of Valkyrie and go looking for the gods.
Adventure through stages and dungeons and nurture a character and companions through farming

name: Meteor Hunt Idle
description: Join our crew, mine meteors, build a base, fight space pirates, and make your wallet as fat as the moon!

name: Longleaf Valley
description: Longleaf Valley is in danger and it’s your job to save it! Design and create your own wildlife reserve: build habitats, rescue animals and restore the forest.

name: Diggy: Gold Rush
description: You have a big mission! Help Diggy, the gold miner, dig deep into the earth and draw the path to find the hidden objects. In each expedition you can collect all kinds of items: gold, minerals, precious stones, special objects and much more! Use the ground digger and digging tools to help Diggy get rich!

name: Knight Hero Adventure idle RPG
description: The world of magic and heroes, in the genre of rpg and roguelike games, needs a sword and bow master to protect it. Brave knight, an ancient evil has attacked the kingdom! The fate of the kingdom is now in your hands, assassin!

name: Sunrise Village: Farm Game
description: Explore a peaceful village surrounded by nature  Help your grandfather with handling a farm  Meet friendly villagers  Dive into exciting mysteries along your way

name: My Pizza Story
description: Introducing My Pizza Story, the ultimate idle RPG management simulator game where you can Role-play as a cute Komo Chef and build your very own pizza palace!

name: Win Over the Flawed Girl
description: Win Over the Flawed Girl is an easy two-choice puzzle game to make the little flawed beauty girls (monsters, spirits and ghosts) happy！

name: Merge Bistro
description: Are you ready to become the ultimate culinary mastermind? Then step into the world of Merge Bistro, where you’ll create mouth-watering dishes by merging different elements and running your very own restaurant!

name: Arrow War
description:
Collect, Upgrade, Dominate
Defend your castle from endless enemies

name: Idle Dig Gold: Craft Adventure
description: Enter the world of professional gold diggers, explore new lands, dig for gold, fill your ship and take them to conquer new lands! You will enjoy smooth gameplay and super beautiful graphics that we have dedicatedly built and created. Build your strategy and use measures to expand the land, dig a lot of gold and upgrade your boat. This is really an addictive, fresh and unique game that will turn you into a gold digger enthusiast.

name: Zelda's Adventure
description:
In the 1990s Nintendo made a deal with Philips to develop 3 Zelda titles. The first 2 were side scrolling platformers, similar to Zelda II, and the third was a traditional top-down action adventure game.

Zelda’s Adventure looked interesting and it would be fun to play on a portable system. The Game Boy was chosen because of the existing Zelda games on the system.

The game sticks to the aesthetics of Link’s Awakening, but also incorporates some features from Oracle of Ages and Oracle of Seasons.

This is a complete port of the CDi original and was developed in GB Studio, with a few modifications.

name: Kounai Shasei Vol.1: Yonimo H na Monogatari
description: "Kounai Shasei 1" opens with a text introduction that describes a miraculous Girls' High School that can be accessed by sailing through the Indian Ocean or walking along the Silk Road - a school that even the famous Marco Polo allegedly describes in his memoirs. This establishes the humorous tone of subsequent narrative, which has little to do with history and a lot to do with pretty high school girls. The game has no real story, being instead composed of five unrelated vignettes, short episodes that feature a sexy high school girl, a male protagonist (named "God" by default), and various comical and erotic situations under different circumstances: meeting in a school, haunted house, crowded train station, etc.

name: VT Harmony
description: Play as VT a lonely TV-boy that want to be alone until the unexpected message from an stranger bunny named IV. Discover the different endings of this visual novel game.

name: Ninku
description: Ninku is a PlayStation game based on the manga of the same name. It consists of anime cutscenes interspersed with one-on-one turn-based battles.

name: The Witch of Sherdorne Forest
description: The Lord's son has vanished and you decide to venture out in search of the boy.

name: Ninku
description: Ninku is a fighting game with adventure elements, for the Game Boy. It is based on the manga of the same name.

name: Mushroom Mountain
description: Mushroom Mountain is a puzzle game for the PICO-8 console where players plant, destroy, grow, and spread mushrooms to control doors along a branching mountain trail.

name: The Idolmaster: Shiny Colors - Song for Prism
description: The Idolmaster: Shiny Colors - Song for Prism is a free-to-play rhythm game based on The Idolmaster: Shiny Colors.

name: Hidden Epee
description: Sin descripción

name: Nice Body All-Star Suiei Taikai
description: Sin descripción

name: Need for Speed: Carbon
description: Need for Speed: Carbon, also known as NFS Carbon or NFSC, is an Electronic Arts video game in the Need for Speed series. It is the tenth installment and was the first game in the series to gain the PEGI rating of 12+. The game is a sequel to 2005's Need for Speed: Most Wanted.

name: Need for Speed: Carbon - Own the City
description: Game Boy Advance port of Need for Speed: Carbon - Own the City.

name: Need for Speed: Carbon - Own the City
description: Java Mobile port of Need for Speed Carbon Own The City.

name: Need for Speed: Carbon
description: Need for Speed: Carbon, also known as NFS Carbon or NFSC, is an Electronic Arts video game in the Need for Speed series. It is the tenth installment and was the first game in the series to gain the PEGI rating of 12+. The game is a sequel to 2005's Need for Speed: Most Wanted.

name: Cube Experimental
description: Cube Experimental is a single player modification for Fallout 3, set in a long deserted, underground scientific facility right below the post-nuclear Washington D.C.

name: Need for Speed: Carbon
description: A port of Need for Speed Carbon released for Arcade machines.

name: Survivor Idle Run
description: Survive the zombie apocalypse and become the ultimate hero in Survivor Idle Run! Take control of your character and battle against hordes of flesh-eating zombies. Along the way, summon powerful allies to fight alongside you and merge them to create even stronger allies. Want to speed up the action? Click to enter fever mode and take down enemies at lightning speed! With idle gameplay, your hero will keep fighting even when you're away. Are you ready to take on the undead and save the world? Join the adventure now and become the ultimate survivor!

name: Need for Speed: ProStreet
description: Compete at the highest level of street racing with Need for Speed ProStreet. It’s no longer good enough to simply rule your local neighborhood; you need to dominate on a global stage. Build the ultimate battle machine, take it to multi-disciplinary showdowns and pit your skills and reputation against the world’s best street racers.

name: Need for Speed: ProStreet
description: Compete at the highest level of street racing with Need for Speed ProStreet. It’s no longer good enough to simply rule your local neighborhood; you need to dominate on a global stage. Build the ultimate battle machine, take it to multi-disciplinary showdowns and pit your skills and reputation against the world’s best street racers.

name: Need for Speed: Nitro
description:
Unleash your inner speed demon with Need for Speed Nitro for the Nintendo DS. This high-energy racing game delivers fast-paced, arcade-style action, letting you dominate the streets with style and speed.

Choose from a wide selection of licensed cars from top manufacturers and customize them with an array of performance upgrades and visual modifications to create your ultimate racing machine. Race through vibrant and dynamic environments inspired by real-world locations, each filled with shortcuts and hidden paths that provide strategic advantages.

Take on challenging AI opponents in various game modes, including Circuit, Elimination, and Drift. Master the art of drifting and nitro boosts to leave your rivals in the dust and achieve victory. The intuitive controls and responsive touch screen interface make car handling smooth and enjoyable.

Compete with friends in local multiplayer races via DS Download Play, and show off your racing skills and custom rides. With its colorful graphics, pulse-pounding soundtrack, and exhilarating gameplay, Need for Speed Nitro for the Nintendo DS offers a thrilling racing experience that you can take anywhere.

Get ready to rev your engines and burn rubber in a race to the finish line. Speed, style, and adrenaline await you in Need for Speed Nitro!

name: Noitcelfer
description: You are lost in a world of invisible blocks, but these blocks cast a reflection. Your only hope of escaping is to use the reflection to see where to jump. Try to avoid landing on the spikes or being killed by the enemies!

name: Chef Ramsay
description:
Gordon Ramsay likes you very much. You are his top chef and you never disappoint.

But do you have what it takes to be a master chef? I certainly doubt it! Complete objectives to try and impress him. Who knows? You may even make it out alive.

name: Return of Double Dragon
description: Return of Double Dragon features several significant differences from Super Double Dragon: the title theme and most of the background music were shuffled around (e.g. the Mission 1 theme from Super Double Dragon is played during Mission 4 in Return of Double Dragon) and the player can perform certain actions which cannot be done in Super Double Dragon (such as retrieving a boomerang after throwing it or hitting an opponent more than once successively with the hurricane kick). The enemy placement is also different in both versions and weapons such as knives and incendiary bombs do less damage in Return of Double Dragon. Enemies can duck end combo blows, thus preventing the player from finishing their combos. The final Mission also features two additional levels before the final battle. An Option Mode is included in Return of Double Dragon as well, allowing players to adjust the game's difficulty level, as well as listen to the game's music and sound effects.

name: Across The Void
description: Across The Void is an exciting new roguelike video game that will take you on a journey through a universe of endless possibilities. Featuring randomly generated maps and side maps, the game offers a new adventure every time you play. With a unique skill system, players can create their own playstyle by investing in three different trees, each with its own set of skills tailored to different playstyles. With over 50 skills to unlock, you can customize your character to your liking and take on the universe on your own terms.

name: Need for Speed: The Run
description: Nintendo 3DS port of Need for Speed: The Run.

name: Need for Speed: Shift 2 Unleashed
description: iOS port of Need for Speed: Shift 2 Unleashed.

name: Need for Speed: Shift
description: PlayStation Portable port of Need for Speed: Shift.

name: Need for Speed: Undercover
description: Nintendo DS port of Need for Speed Undercover.

name: Need for Speed: Undercover
description: PSP port of Need for Speed Undercover.

name: Salthe
description:
“Life is a tragedy when seen in close-up, but a comedy in long-shot.”

At the end of a journey of blood, despair, regret, and madness— a stage perched on the razor's edge dividing life and death. With no audience to cheer, at a jester's direction, Salthe performs her past. To learn the reason for her death. To return to the world of life.

Each scene is full of scorn and mockery, she writhes and struggles, through to the end
of the tale of Salthe's life—a comedy——

name: Need for Speed: Undercover
description: Nintendo Wii port of Need for Speed Undercover.

name: Gyvolver
description:
For thousands of years, the inhabitants of Gytaraxis have lived in peace thanks to the energy barriers that protect their planet and its power source, the Vityrian Crystals.

Hoping to seize the power crystals for itself in an effort to make its armies invincible, the evil Calamitous Cube has declared war on Gytaraxis. Using virulent vibrations, the Calamitous Cube has eaten holes through the energy barriers that protect Gytaraxis.

In an effort to fend off the Calamitous Cube, the Gytaraxians have called upon the legendary repairship known as Gyvolver to fix the energy barriers and keep the crystals from falling into the Calamitous Cube’s grasp.

name: Need for Speed: Undercover
description: PlayStation 2 port of Need for Speed Undercover.

name: Need for Speed: Porsche Unleashed
description: Delivers the next level of open road racing experiences with an extensive collection of cars from the 50-year history of Porsche.

name: Rogue with the Dead
description: Rogue with the Dead is an original roguelike RPG where you command and power up troops on an endless, looping journey. What kills you makes you stronger.

name: Slime Quest
description:
The MMORPG "players" have been hunting us and turning us into EXP and alchemy materials.
You're a surviving slime, the only hero who can save their kind!

name: HeroSurvival
description:
The world is in endless chaos, and all creatures are devastated by endless chaos.
You need to eradicate thousands of terror monsters in this chaotic and terrible world, unlock more weapons and skills, and survive to the end. Good luck.

name: Shooting Survival
description: This is the 2d shooting game with building and crafting that features extremely easy play styles. Its super cool and enjoyable gameplay, mixed with rogue-like, crafting, and farming elements will get you hooked from the very first shooting run!

name: Cell: Idle Factory Incremental
description: CIFI is a complex incremental idle game with more than meets the eyes. Here, you'll build, grow and upgrade a star fleet of industry & production based ships. The goal is to produce as many cells as possible! Thousands of upgrades await to help you in this particular endeavor!

name: Blade Crafter
description:
Are you bored? Craft the Legendary Blade right now!
Your weapon will move around and fight on its own, as if it's alive.

name: Shootero: Galaxy Space Shooter
description: Shootero is an arcade shooting game like galaga shooter with stylized gameplay. It is not a mundane alien shooter game, but highlighted with a combination of classic galaxy attack gameplay and rogue-lite features. Shootero definitely puts you on fire every time you play.

name: Doomdepths
description: Doomdepths is a turn based roguelite with rpg elements.

name: Cards, Universe & Everything
description: Cards, the Universe and Everything (CUE) is the ultimate CCG where you collect and trade thousands of cards and battle them in epic games.

name: Grow Turret
description: PixelStar Games 4th grow series Grow Turret.

name: Idle Tower Defense
description: Idle Tower Defense is an incremental tower defense game. Defend your tower from waves of enemies. Earn coins by defeating enemies to upgrade your tower's abilities.

name: Dunlight: Random Defense
description: Dunlight is a random defense game that combines the chess genre and the defense genre. Block monsters in the dungeon with your own choices in a situation of randomly given heroes, items, and options.

name: Medieval Merge: Epic Adventure
description: This farm has a story to tell. A land full of mystery awaits! In every corner lies a new discovery in this world of epic adventure as you help our heroine fulfill her quest.

name: Miner Gun Builder
description: You are the captain of a space ship and fly through missions to earn money. With the money you can buy parts to build your weapon in your space ship. You can also buy bigger and better ships which can fit more parts. Building a small weapon is straight forward, but later you can build extremely strong weapons if you use the available space wisely.

name: Stickman War: Stick Fight Army
description: Stickman War: Stick Fight Army might be the most addictive stick war mobile game that you have ever enjoyed. This game challenges you to win the Throne by making a strategy to build up your stick Empire and conquering all Enemies.

name: Sushi Bar Idle
description: Always wanted to have your own Sushi Restaurant? The time is now. Open restaurants in the most iconic cities from around the world, and deliver delicious dishes to your customers.

name: Homeless Life
description:
When playing the role of homeless people, making their living, what will you do to earn money, buy food, find a place to live, life is not easy, surviving in the city is a challenge.
The life of a homeless person, at first you will have to beg for money, the game allows you to earn extra money by buying and changing clothes in the style of the homeless, the fashion of the homeless Also a way to make money.

name: Idle Dice 2
description:
The sequel for Idle Dice is here!
Idle Dice 2 expands on the gameplay of its predecessor and adds more things

name: Idle Magic Clicker
description: Welcome to Idle Magic Clicker, a fair designed tap game for players who like incremental and idle games. Have you always dreamed of becoming the most powerful wizard ever? In this idle clicker with magic fantasy flair you can realize it. Your currency in this game is pure power. With this power you will upgrade new spells, explore new mighty spheres and create power stones.

name: Idle Ants
description: Ants are the true lords of the underground and they live among us. They’ve been building cities and expanding their communities well before man was able to cobble together his first hut. Now, you can enter the land of ants and see first hand their organized life and structured world take shape.

name: Goblin's Workshop
description: Goblin's Workshop is a simple and easy item making simulation & RPG idle game.

name: SSSnaker
description:
A Snake X Bullet Hell roguelite shooter that no one's ever seen!
Grow to ginormous proportions and blast your enemies to kingdom come! It's Sssnaker!
In the dangerous dungeon depths, your snake won't just grow longer, it'll also get stronger!

name: Play for Granny Grandpa Part 4
description:
Choose for whom you will play granny or grandpa. Both of them are serious rivals and everyone can catch a prisoner.
Make your choice and don't let the prisoner escape from the house.

name: Vertigo
description: A physics-based rock climbing simulator.

name: Blocky Granny Mod chapter One
description: This fun simulator game is an escape horror granny game, you have been chased and captured by awful blocky granny and locked you on this horror house in order not let you escape, granny hides keys in her treasure chests, so after finding them and collect all the keys and object escape the horror house.

name: Grandpa And Granny Home Escape
description: Grandpa And Granny House Escape is a horror game where you will be chased by an insane grandpa and a scary granny. Oh, they adore playing hide-and-seek. Surely, it is not an ordinary hide-and-seek fun – but a tough survival experience. Grandpa and granny always find a new victim to play their cruel game of survival. Your escape will not be easy because granny and grandpa are very experienced hunters.

name: Rapid Fire Brigade
description:
Rapid Fire Brigade, the ultimate retro shooter experience!

Embark on an exhilarating journey in Rapid Fire Brigade, the ultimate retro arcade shooter game that promises hours of addictive, action-packed gameplay. Conquer captivating levels, become an arcade hero, and immerse yourself in a world filled with intense battles and strategic decisions.

Begin with basic weapons and gradually upgrade your arsenal to an unbeatable powerhouse. Complete missions to earn rewards, enhance your character, and master an array of formidable weapons. Make smart choices by selecting the right weapons and power-ups for each mission, upgrading your character, and unlocking new abilities in the skill tree to boost your firepower.

Experience challenging levels brimming with secrets, formidable bosses, and enthralling gameplay twists! Revel in stunning retro-inspired graphics and effects that transport you back in time.

name: Iron Man
description: Iron Man is an unlicensed 2D platform game for the Sega Genesis based off the movie of the same name. It was released by BMB in 2014.

name: Harry Potter
description: Harry Potter is an unlicensed Sega Mega Drive game based on the Harry Potter movies. The game is a Pac-Man clone.

name: Poker Club 6 in 1
description: Queen of Poker Club is an adult, unlicensed poker game developed by Thin Chen Enterprise and published by Sachen, and released exclusively in Taiwan sometime in the 1990s.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Ch.1 Onikakushi-hen
description: On a certain day in June, someone dies, and someone else goes missing. The series of deaths is connected to the upheaval surrounding the dam construction project. A murder case that was covered up is being reenacted. Is it a conspiracy? A coincidence? Or perhaps a curse?

name: Kemono Friends: Kingdom
description: Welcome to "Kingdom", an abandoned large-scale theme park where you will meet a diverse cast of animal friends and embark on a miraculous adventure with them. But beware of the azure monsters scattered throughout the Kingdom! With the help of your animal friends' unique characteristics and the landform organs' mechanisms, you can overcome these mysterious enemies and save the Kingdom together.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Ch.2 Watanagashi-hen
description: Keiichi wins a game tournament and gives his prize, a doll, to Rena stating that Mion will not be interested in such girly things, though Mion is actually rather hurt that Keiichi thinks about her that way, though she pretends not to mind.

name: Snail Bob 4: Space
description: Sin descripción

name: Snail Bob 5: Love Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Snail Bob 6: Winter Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Snail Bob 7: Fantasy Story
description: Sin descripción

name: The Jungle Book
description:
IBM produced FMV game starring uncredited chimpanzee and Gary Schwartz.

Deep within India's Black Jungle, a scandalous crime has taken place. Someone has stolen the jeweled crown of King Louie, the orangutan who rules Monkey City. Now he's hoppin' mad and there will be no peace until his crown is returned. Mowgli and his friends are counting on you to help recover this sacred treasure and restore calm to the jungle world.

name: Tree Hole: Adventures In Wonderland
description: While exploring a cave you come across a tree with a magical hole in it. The hole draws you in and everything goes black. Waking up confused about the past events you find out that you ended up in some sort of magical town in which some of its citizens mysteriously disappeared. What happened to the citizens, how can you find your way home and how is all this connected. Your adventure starts now.

name: F1 23: Champions Edition
description: F1 23 Champions Edition and receive 3 days Early Access, Max Verstappen designed racing in-game items, 4 New My Team Racing Icons, 4 Braking Point 2 My Team Icons and much more!

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Ch.3 Tatarigoroshi-hen
description: Satoko's uncle Teppei returns to Hinamizawa to take custody of Satoko and resume an abusive relationship with her, where he treats her like a slave while demanding money from her. Keiichi cannot accept this stalemate, and he makes it his personal mission to rescue Satoko.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Ch.4 Himatsubushi-hen
description: Akasaka Mamoru, a detective is sent to Hinamizawa to rescue Inukai Toshiki, the grandson of a government official, who is taken hostage. While waiting for Makino, he meets a younger Furude Rika at the bus stop.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Ch.5 Meakashi-hen
description: Sonozaki Shion escapes from her private school to return to Hinamizawa. During her time there, she meets Satoshi, who protected her from a group of thugs.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Ch.6 Tsumihoroboshi-hen
description: Is the curse really real? This chapter presents the events from another view, which reveals additional information about Rena's past and Keiichi's reasons for moving to Hinamizawa from Tokyo.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Ch.7 Minagoroshi-hen
description: Furude Rika is in an altered state of reality. Around her, various prisms float and circulate her. As she examines them, she mentions that they are "fragments" from the various Junes of 1983.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Ch.8 Matsuribayashi-hen
description: The final arc in the Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kai series. It is mostly told from the viewpoint of Rika Furude, as well as her other friends.

name: Randal's Tuesday
description: Everything begins on a Wednesday, early in the morning. Our three protagonists are testifying in front of the Student Council leaded by no other than the Dean himself. They have been accused of committing a horrendous act (players don’t know about it just yet) and this is the only chance they have to try and clean their names.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei
description: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei is a collection of short stories that features the characters of the previous chapters.

name: Croket! Kindan no Kinka Box
description: Sin descripción

name: Spider-Man
description: Trouble's ahead for Peter Parker in Spider-Man's first appearance on the Game Boy Color: an explosion at Dr. Curt Conners' lab will lead him into a plot planned by a mysterious villain, involving the alien symbiote and several of Spidey's arch enemies.

name: Gateway
description: Guide the character through a series of rooms. Solve a mini-puzzle within each room to advance.

name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted
description: A port of Need for Speed Most Wanted released for mobile devices.

name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted
description: PlayStation Vita port of Need for Speed Most Wanted.

name: Tekken 2
description: An unlicensed port of the PlayStation version of Tekken 2 for Nintendo Famicom by Hummer Team in 1996.

name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit
description: A port of Need for Speed Hot Pursuit released for mobile devices.

name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit
description: Nintendo Wii port of Need for Speed Hot Pursuit.

name: Kikou Busou G-Breaker: Legend of Cloudia
description: Kikou Busou G-Breaker: Legend of Cloudia is an Action/Simulation game, developed by Atelier-Sai and published by Sunrise Interactive, which was released in Japan in 2002

name: D.W.'s Nightmare
description: D.W. 's Nightmare is a short horror game in which you are playing as D.W. Read. Your doll has been cursed. It's up to you to survive 3 minutes by constantly finding where the doll spawns. Don't get too comfortable. If you take too long, the doll will kill you. Will you step up to the challenge or be the doll's first victim?

name: Soak 'Em Out
description: Soak ‘Em Out is an endless score attack game that takes heavy influence from the Game & Watch Gallery series. You play as Tina, a cat trying to catch a bus that unfortunately is taking an unusually long time to arrive. To make matters worse, a big storm is brewing! With no true shelter nearby and only an umbrella to take cover with, how long are you able to delay the inevitable before getting soaked out?

name: Everest Explorer
description: Everest Explorer is a simulation of planning and executing an expedition to Mt. Everest. Players must use an assigned budget to buy supplies and equipment and to hire porters, then they must manage their resources during the climb.

name: Nazi Zombies: Portable
description:
A Call of Duty: Zombies "de-make" made in the 1996 Quake engine, in development since 2009.

The game itself is feature-equivalent with Call of Duty: World at War on a generic level. Gameplay components are implemented with minor parity differences. Most World at War maps and their unique features are not yet represented. Various small additions and changes from Call of Duty: Black Ops are present as a means of gameplay smoothing, but not on a wide scale. NZ:P is, first and foremost, a Call of Duty: World at War remake.

name: The Intermine Legacy: I am the Darkness
description:
Deep underground, nestled in the remains of a post-apocalyptic American South, rests a cryogenic facility called Intermine Laboratories. In this miniscule piece of frost-stricken hell rests a collective of eclectic individuals who are inexplicably awoken from their restless dreams long before their assigned time.

But, the facility has changed in the time since they've gone to sleep. It's become a fascistic nightmare in the wake of a gruesome civil war, and everywhere they go ... it feels like they're being watched. To add insult to injury, some of them have started acting ... funny ...

name: Teacher Certification Hell
description: This producer wants you to study on Steam again!! This is a game about Teacher Certification Knowledge. Depending on your strategy (ability), choose the right item at the beginning, and then use the answer to break through each Layers! After 100 layers, waiting for you may be......

name: West Country Mayhem
description: Fight to survive from horde of hunters. Choose from a variety of guns and upgrades to create an ultimate killing machine!

name: Eddie's Arcade
description: Uniquely satisfying puzzle game spread out over different graphical themes. The puzzles get harder as you advance, giving you the pleasing sense of accomplishment. Collect arcade tokens to unlock new machines. Over 125 levels for hours of play.

name: Not In My Cave
description: Defend Yourself! Not in my cave is the last line of defense to protect your magical spells from unrelenting attacks from the undead and goblin hordes. In this action based tower defense style game protect your spell books from being looted and leaving yourself defenseless!

name: Eliminator: The Encapsuled Nemesis
description: Eliminator: The Encapsuled Nemesis is an tactical single-player shooter for everyone. Sneak to hostile fortifications, destroy your foes, capture flags, collect new weapons and fight your way through enemy lines to crush their evil plans.

name: Neon Fantasy: Animals
description: Neon Fantasy: Animals is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Borefest
description: "Why would you waste your time making this? Couldn't you have made something fun instead? Games are supposed to be fun..." - The Game Developer's Dad

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Space Spectacular
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Space themed tables that will take you on a journey through time!

name: Spooky Men
description: Spooky Men is a online 2-4 player cooperative survival-horror game. Retrieve forgotten items and complete tasks while avoiding a ghost. Use your wits to distract the ghost and survive its attacks as you explore the spooky house. Can you and your friends make it out alive?

name: I Commissioned Some Bees 15
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 20 art pieces to choose from, and 2000+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Ash of Gods: The Way - Deluxe Edition
description: Get the turn-based story-driven tactical card game with hand crafted battles, plus digital extras including soundtrack and art book!

name: Damn Zombies
description: First-person action survival game set in a post-apocalyptic overrun by flesh-hungry zombies. Roam a city devastated by a mysterious virus

name: Japanese Drift Master
description: Welcome to Japan, the drift capital of the world! Compete, drift, and race on miles of varied roads and winding mountain trails. Drive through towns nestled at the scenic Haikama Lake. Spend your savings on new cars and get a taste of Japanese tuning style.

name: Tuk Tuk Race
description: "Tuk Tuk Race" is a game in which you race in a tuk-tuk. Ride a tuk-tuk and try to win the race! Let's drive in the nature of beautiful graphics in a tuk-tuk. Now, please enjoy this funny racing game.

name: BurnOut
description: A realistic tactical shooter, with customizable weapons, pve, coop and multiplayer missions.

name: Everholm
description: Lilly was spirited away to a mysterious island. As her memories fade, everyone seems to know about her quest for her missing sister. It's time to establish a homestead, meet the islanders, learn their secrets and solve the mystery of Everholm in this open-ended minimalist RPG!

name: Kao the Kangaroo: Anniversary Edition
description: A year after the world premiere of the newest adventures of Kao the Kangaroo, the Anniversary Edition is finally here!

name: Railway Empire 2: Deluxe Edition
description: The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the full Railway Empire 2 game, the original soundtrack, exclusive skins for each of the three sizes of your railway stations, an exclusive skin for your company HQ, and an exclusive skin for two locomotives.

name: Supergalactix
description: A casual planet-conquering strategic game that in its simplicity offers great complexity and numerous game modes like tournaments, campaigns, online/LAN play, and much more! Bundled with a multitude of AI bots, maps and missions.

name: Arcade Fishing
description: Arcade Fishing is a classic fishing game.

name: Sphere 3
description: Some roads lead to salvation, others - to eternal damnation. What will you choose?

name: Call of the Sea VR
description:
Call of the Sea VR is an otherworldly tale of mystery and love, set in the 1930s South Pacific. You’ll explore a lush island paradise, solve puzzles and unlock secrets in refreshing new ways with Meta Quest.

Go on the hunt for your husband’s missing expedition as Norah Everhart, fully voice-acted by Cissy Jones (Firewatch, The Walking Dead: Season 1), and take in the beautiful sights of a cryptic land, uncovering occult mysteries and venturing through forgotten ruins. What will you find among the remnants of a lost civilization?

name: I Swear this Hentai Game was a Gift
description: A relaxing puzzle game with cute anime girls. You didn't buy this game; it was a gift. We believe you.

name: Married Woman Cosplay Life
description: Masataka and Misuzu are newlyweds. Masataka proposes costume play sex for Misuzu, who is new to sex, and Misuzu gradually learns to enjoy it.

name: The Voyager
description: After working all your life you have finally managed to build a device that allows you to travel between parallel worlds. will you be able to return home?

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster) - Orca
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster". Purchasing this item adds the following Buster as a character that can be used in gameplay. - Orca (Buster)

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster) - Anemone
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster". Purchasing this item adds the following Buster as a character that can be used in gameplay. - Anemone (Buster)

name: Xenosis
description: Xenosis is a thrilling metroidvania where you traverse an ancient temple that has been overrun by alien creatures. Armed with your blaster, you must combat a variety of challenging enemies and upgrade your weapon to escape

name: Zombie Dead Smasher
description: Grab your gun and get ready to defeat the hideous zombies in this thrilling game.

name: Swipe Fight!
description: Sin descripción

name: Endless Wander
description:
Endless Wander is a pixel art Action Roguelike designed for mobile platforms.

A unique system in which you combine skills and magic runes to update and improve your attack combo during a run
Long-term progression mechanics centered around leveling up characters and getting the right equipment for them
A narrative progression about the main character's sister and the world on the other side of the portal

name: Idle Inn Empire
description: Sin descripción

name: Roll With it!
description: Roll into action as you take the roll of a rolling ball that's trying to make it's way through the world on a journey of discovery! finish levels, gain coins, unlock skins, and just Roll With It!

name: Idle Boxing
description: Sin descripción

name: Deadly Dunk
description:
Our hero Jordan is good at basketball. He always see out thieves trying to escape on the street. And he tends to use his skillful dunk to stop the thieves.
Unfortunately, it's tricky to do that because the street is full of obstacles.
He needs your help to find the best way beat the thieves.

name: Dangle Dash
description: Deke, chip, and toe drag through a fun hockey experience like no other. By using one touch controls, this is a new fun way to play hockey on mobile. Swipe-up to chip the puck in the air, swipe-down to perform a toe drag, and tap the screen three times quickly to go on fire, which adds a temporary multiplier.

name: House of Mouse
description:
Get ready to challenge your friends in exciting, action packed mini games in House of Mouse by GameiMax.
House of Mouse, a world of delight right at the tip of your fingers With just one simple touch in this itsy bitsy world of fun, you'll be running, flying, and bumping around to gather stars and power-ups.

name: Mighty Block
description:
The Kingdom of Blockytop has been overrun by Blavos and his minions. Puzzle your way through the kingdom, defeating each henchman and restoring peace to the land.
Launch matched blocks at the enemies to defeat them. Set up chain combos for greater damage and points. Don't let pieces stack to the top, or it's game over. Move and think fast to rack up high scores!

name: Penalty Madness
description:
Are you a furious fan? Is football is everything for you? Penalty Madness will give you a unique opportunity to test your accuracy and prove to all other players that you are the best. Score goals, do not get into the players - this is all you need to know to start.
Collect cups, unlock a whole ton of players and balls in the most incredible images.
Every ten rounds a fan round passes, collecting a fan dictionary. There has never been a better time to play in Penalty Madness, so rather wear your sneakers and hit the ball with power.

name: Caveman Birdminton
description:
Easy to play yet difficult to master, Caveman Birdminton fast and fluid gameplay and a huge range of unique player styles and characteristics to unlock and play.
With just a simple one-fingered swipe you’ll soon be thumping crosscourt winners, yet at the core of Caveman Birdminton is a highly sophisticated physics engine that rewards tactical play.

name: Sheep Simulator AR
description:
The most realistic and cutest Augmented Reality Virtual Pet Sheep Simulation game! You can choose to play in 3D or AR mode.
One day, you receive a box with a lovely sheep illustration on the cover, when you open it you discover a live tiny sheep!
Do your best to care for this sheep, tiny pets need food, rest and amusement. Choose what food you give your sheep wisely, as different types of food will affect your sheep’s personality and mood as it grows up.
Shopaholics will love the amazing selection of outfits and costumes for the sheep!
Play with your sheep in the real world in AR mode.
Entertain your sheep with fun playsets such as a carnival ferris wheel and swimming pool!

name: Vs. Racing 2
description: Experience the thrill of all-out arcade racing!

name: Jumper Kiwi
description: Join new challenge and even challenge your friends to beat your score. Guaranteed fun, you get to put Kiwi, safe from obstacles. Kiwi is a bird with small wings and can not fly, so you'll have to help him overcome the obstacles to get as far as possible. Will spend vibrant moments with the variety of obstacles to jump, but if you play two hours, you wanting more to go further. Find the different characters and discover that each holds.

name: Wrinkle
description: Embark on a journey through a charming, hand-drawn world filled with familiar locations and objects that become unique hazards. Jump, Fly, and Swim your way across the world of Wrinkle!

name: Can Your Talking?
description: Teach your talking to your pet.

name: Stroke The Beaver
description:
Beavers are interesting creatures, they are both wet and furry, due to being in the water so much. Many of us have never stroked one before, but now if your chance to touch one for the first time.

Well, you can't really touch one, but you can at least make it look like you have a beaver in your very own home.

name: Arcade Archives: Tecmo Knight
description: Kick the beastman away!

name: Block Craft Racing
description:
Block Craft Racing is an exciting new rally game with a fantastic mine and craft style that people have come to love. Simplistic and exciting it really brings a new thing to the racing genre. With 12 fun races plus new ones added for free.
Select your vehicle and camera affect to have a unique race, changing every time and adding something a little special. Watch for obstructions that are on the track, they will slow you down.
Every time you finish a race you'll win a prize based on your position. Win enough dollars and you can craft your block ride to really leave the competition in the dirt.

name: Highway Crash Derby
description:
Take your race car out on the highway and try to cause as much damage as you can!
Swipe your way through the traffic and wait for the right moment to cause a massive highway crash. The further you drive without crashing, the higher you can score!

name: Ancient Surfer 2
description: A year has passed since SummerTime Surfing began. Now, Ancient Surfer is back – more stylish than ever! This time, surf Earth to surf Space! Ride the waves like never before in this next-gen Surfing game!

name: Feed’em Burger
description:
Want to become great burger maker for Feed'em Burger restaurants!?
You will be hired in Feed'em Burger restaurant to serve clients as fast as you can.
Take orders from your customers and make a great burger for them in a wink . The more you will play, the more crazy challenges will appear in the orders!

name: Dice Soccer City
description:
Build your Town. Pick your Squad. Roll the Dice, and Score!!
From the makers of Pixel People, comes a deep & charming game of strategy, luck and city-building, all rolled into one! As manager of a tiny colony's soccer club, you must assemble a team of local residents, use whatever skills they may possess, and bring home the glory you deserve.
Gifted with tactics, talent, and technology, you are destined for success – but a host of challenges stand between you and your fate!
Will you be able to attract enough players to your town? Will they be able to work together in winning combinations? Will you fulfil the dreams of becoming a Flagship City by winning the coveted Five Leagues? Who will you pick? Who will you drop? How far will you push them using the tools at your disposal? The choice is yours.

name: Nox Archaist Game Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: 1-Bit Return
description: 1-Bit Return is a Super Fun, Retro Isometric Platformer. Its Classic Style Features Retro PixelArt with Chiptune Sound Effects. Face 25 Arcade Challenges or Compete with the World in an Endless Adventure. Over 40 Randomised Worlds, 25 Challenges with Unlockable Characters and Much More.

name: Super Hero Boy: A Platform Adventure
description: Find the rings, get the key and race to the exit!

name: Pocket Squid Fishing
description:
Enjoy the most unique and relaxing fishing experience anytime anywhere with your iOS devices.
Experience the true joy of catching live squids and legendary sea creatures.
Your ultimate goal is to catch all species of marine life in the sea of Squido Island and complete the collections of Fishbook and Treasurepedia.

name: Mr.Ninja!! Fever
description: Can you defeat the Cosmic Gang and save the Shogun? Wild new levels, boss fights, and more! Stylish alien-slicing ninja action - now accepting challengers, no experience required!

name: He@rtstrings
description: When your red string of fate connects to three guys, what will you do?

name: Light the Way
description:
"Welcome to Lion's Pride. You've come here to apply as one of our servers, is that correct?"...

It's your first day as a server at the cabaret, and you've already been asked out by five charming young men!! Suave, energetic, affectionate, gentle, or carefree… which do you prefer?

name: Bomber-Mario
description:
The classic Nintendo game meets bombs and castles in this fun Mario adventure.

This is a strategy game compared to the original Mario versions that you have likely played or seen. The goal of the game is to blow up the enemies that you see in each level. As Mario, you have access to several types of bombs. You can upgrade your bombs in the game as you gain experience. You'll start with smaller bombs that are used for the mediocre enemies before seeing the larger bombs that are meant to do significant damage to the larger enemies, especially those that come toward the end of the game.

name: Criminal Archives: Alphabetic Murders DLC
description: Are the murders of three different people connected? Or are we dealing with three different incidents? Cunning and logic are your best weapons in solving this case!

name: Zelda: Meadow of Shadows
description: Meadow of Shadows is a short hack of the Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past made under an 18 hour timer as apart of a challenge between myself, JaredBrian, Letterbomb, and Zarby89. The game features three dungeons and a final gauntlet area. It showcases the abilities of the ZScream editor and acts as a prequel to the upcoming Oracle of Secrets ROM hack.

name: Blobi Sprint
description: One button fast tapping game for 2-4 players. Tap the button as fast as you can to stay on screen and win!

name: Half-Life: Pulse
description:
Pulse is a MOD for Half-Life 1. Pulse takes place in Black Mesa after the incident. You are famous scientist Gordon Freeman. In the beginning of Pulse, you are in Surface Lab A Security Complex, a lab and security station on the absolute surface of the Black Mesa Research Facility. You are working with your scientist pals when one scientist working with a hazardous radiation meter detects high radiation amounts coming from all over. They radio into the Administrator's office, the office of Dr. Wallace Breen. Instead of Breen answering, they pick up a remote conversation between Breen and an unknown voice. "It's done," Breen said. "The Xenian crystal triggered a dimensional rift between Earth and the boarderworld Xen. Now let's get to the surface!" "I'm sure my employers will be pleased," says the unknown voice, and then silence fills the room followed by an explosion. The other scientists are amazed that the Administrator of Black Mesa himself would work with someone to trigger such a disaster and are trying to turn Breen in to the Special Projects Executive, the overseers of the Black Mesa Research Facility. The only way to get the S.P.E. to believe them is to get Dr. Breen's special operations profile from his office and hand it over to the S.P.E. as evidence. The scientists, however, are terrified of entering Black Mesa after a resonance cascade saying it is too dangerous. Gordon Freeman volunteers to go into Black Mesa, retrieve Breen's Administrative profile and bring him to justice.

This MOD suggests that Gina Cross was the one to push the xenian crystal into the anti-mass spectrometer and Gordon was not near Sector C at the time. Surface Lab A Security Complex is located on the surface of Sector D.

The scientists detect that Breen's Administrative profile is located in the Lambda Complex so your goal as Gordon Freeman is to get the Lambda Complex and retrieve Breen's profile and make it back to Surface Lab A alive.

name: Public Enemy: The Dark Future
description:
Public Enemy: The Dark Future is a story-focused sci-fi multiplayer Half-Life modification.

Two teams (The Security Corps and the Syndicate) play the basic role in this game and they will fight against each other in front of this futuristic scenery.

The visual aspects, gameplay features and the design offer you new and interesting possibilities to explore the whole world of Public-Enemy.

name: Loop Hero: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
- The physical Nintendo Switch game
- An exclusive 104-page “Loop Hero Bestiary” Artbook
- The game´s Official Soundtrack download voucher
- A Collectible tuck-in box housing all the contents.

name: Pretty Princess: Magical Garden Island
description:
Create the farm of your dreams!

Cultivate crops and raise livestock while exploring the island to collect resources and create goods in this fun fantasy farming simulation game where you are free to play as you like. Set in a cute European fantasy world, this next installment to the Pretty Princess series will delight all princesses – young or young at heart.

The residents of your magical island are depending on you to keep them thriving and content. Roam the island to collect ingredients and materials to craft the goods they need. Back on your farm, plant seeds to raise crops that will grow over time, and collect milk and eggs from your animals. Use the money and goodwill you earn from your hard work to decorate the island and make it your perfectly cute fantasy home.

name: Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon - Launch Edition
description: In Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon, players will assemble their mech from a wide variety of parts and weaponry to soar freely through mission locales that redefine three-dimensional mobility. Face down overwhelming opposition by outgunning and overrunning your enemies with dynamic movement that makes full use of ranged and melee combat. Players can experience frenetic and fast-paced action that can only be truly achieved with mechs.

name: Mon-Yu: Defeat Monsters And Gain Strong Weapons And Armor. You May Be Defeated, But Don’t Give Up. Become Stronger. I Believe There Will Be A Day When The Heroes Defeat The Devil King.
description: A first-person, turn-based dungeon crawler from Experience Inc. in the tradition of the original Wizardry. Create your own characters to defeat the seven demon kings. Form your team, clear the dungeons, defeat the monsters, and claim victory.

name: Scientist Hunt
description: Scientist Hunt is a Half-Life modification which makes murdering scientists the objective of the game. There are two teams, and each team must compete to murder more scientists than the other team in one of three separate modes of play. SH also features two non-team-based modes of play with entirely different player scenarios, named Live In Fear and Madness. New features include enhanced scientist physics, completely new scientist AI, and much more.

name: Half-Life: Mission of Mercy
description: It seems the G-Man and his government forces cannot keep Xen under their control. We all know how the government responds to something it can't be in charge of....blow it up ! Here's where you come in. The aliens, recognizing your impressive abilities, turn to you for help. If anyone can beat the G-Man at his own game it's you, and the aliens know this to be true. So begins your mission of mercy to save the alien world...... Hiding in the back of a big-rig, you slip into the compound. The science team has prepared the way for you, and Barney will help you when necessary. Not all areas are under heavy guard, but watch your back! Prepare to take on the G-Man's best troops.

name: Citizen Conflict
description: Citizen Conflict is a free-to-play hero shooter designed to merge the best of both worlds - to deliver the competitive heat symptomatic of the esports game modes as well as the Battle Royale frenzy to the masses. The game doesn’t fall short on an immersive storyline, which finds three antagonistic syndicates and captivating heroes waging an endless war for dominance. To scale its futuristic dystopian design to the top, Citizen Conflict will brim over with tons of futuristic maps, guns, and uncanny equipment. Citizen Conflict is now available on Epic Store.

name: Grace Online
description: Grace Online is a captivating 3D fantasy MMORPG (massively-multiplayer online role-playing game) that offers players an immersive experience, allowing them to explore a rich, expansive world filled with secrets and unique creatures. In Grace Online, we believe in player autonomy, which means we guide you through the basics, but there's no hand-holding beyond that. As a result, countless hidden treasures and mysteries await your discovery.

name: Mario Kart 64: Hooting Time
description:
A romhack for Mario Kart 64 that features:

- 4 Player Grand Prix
- 16 characters
- Character colors
- CPUs have all items, settings and ‘AI’
- Dodge shells with feather & rear-view
- Set your own cc speed, GP-points etc.
- much more…

name: Mickey's Speedway USA: Huey
description: A character unlocked by link to the Game Boy Color version via the Transfer Pak.

name: Quest 64 "French Vanilla"
description: Quest 64 “French Vanilla” is a quality-of-life overhaul for Quest 64, that came out of game improvements as part of the Quest 64 Randomizer project “MERROW”. Players requested a QoL ruleset separate (but compatible with) the randomizer ruleset. This patch contains only those QoL options.

name: Mario Party 3 StarStruck
description:
The Mario Party 3 hacking scene has created lots of fantastic custom boards over the last few years, using Party Planner 64. In this compilation patch, 6 of the best custom boards have been bundled for your convenience.

Features

6 new Mario Party 3 boards to play!

Star Summit
Animal Crossing
Paradise Isles
Rainbow Boulevard
Towering Treetop
TRG Land

name: Mario Kart 64: Stomper Mod
description:
A Mario Kart 64 modification, which replaces GP mode with a custom game mode called “Stomper Mode”.

You’re not racing laps, but are tasked to drive over each CPU-driver, in order to stomp and remove them from the “race”.

When all enemies are removed, the game advances to the next course in the cup. In 2-Player mode, each player gets their own point counter, so try to get the most points!

Each cc-class has a different difficulty, so enemies get smaller and therefore more difficult to stomp. They also have a higher max speed, the smaller they are. The item table is limited to Mushrooms, Green Shells, Bananas and Fake Itemboxes.

name: Battle Kart 64
description:
Battle Kart 64 is a rom hack by Triclon for Mario Kart 64 that brings new features and options to the game’s Battle Mode. It is console compatible (note: Expansion Pak required).

New Game Modes:

- “Hot Potato” featuring a timer on whoever was hit last and counts down to zero. Whoever is the “hot potato” when the timer reaches zero loses 1 HP.

- “Squish” where you need to hit, lightning shrink, and then run over the shrunken player to score.

- “Capture The Flag” where you must capture a flag and bring it back to your base to score.

- “Keep Away” where there is one flag to fight over and each player must try to hold onto it as long as possible.

Plus new scoring options, AI bots, item toggling, the original 16 race courses playable in battle mode and much more. It is still being actively developed with new modes and options planned.

name: Castlevania: Maria of Sorrow
description: Castlevania: Aria of Sorrow mod that replaces Soma with Maria Renard, with many other changes to go with it.

name: Senran Kagura Burst Re:Newal - Yumi Character and Campaign
description:
This Downloadable Content Senran Kagura Burst Re:Newal contains:

name: Times & Galaxy
description: Embark on an interplanetary adventure as the first robo reporter for the Times & Galaxy, the solar system's most trusted holopaper. You're just an intern, but if you can get the scoop, write great stories, and impress your colleagues, maybe you'll get to keep your job!
